places/willowshore/industrial-district/i.title: Industrial District
places/willowshore/industrial-district/i.description:
Willowshore’s Lung Wa lumber bosses had a host of other businesses related to materials taken from the woods. Many industrial workers came to Willowshore explicitly for this work, leaving family and friends behind. After the lumber bosses left, Governor Heh Shan-Bao seized control and ordered the laborers to continue working. Upset that they had no choice in the matter, they’ve been gathering late at night under the guidance of Kawaka Myna (male tengu guild leader), a senior bookmaker, to discuss how they should negotiate with the governor to release those who want to leave and fairly pay those who elect to stay.
With the collapse of Lung Wa, many of the businesses that once thrived here have closed up shop. The only ones still functioning are Cloud Paper House (a paper mill run by Kawaka), Jadeite Essentials (a distillery), and Rebel's Leatherworks (a tannery). Wares: alcohol, essential oils and perfume, glassware and glass items, hide and leather items, paper and paper products such as spellbooks and formula books
Cloud Paper House
Jadeite Essentials
Rebel's Leatherworks

places/willowshore/abandoned-estates.htm.title: Abandoned Estates
places/willowshore/abandoned-estates.htm.description: The abandoned lumber lords’ estates, after being thoroughly picked clean, were left to serve as the occasional rage room or dare challenge. An abandoned shrine to Lady Astraea sits in one of the houses, and many have questioned if someone should accept the goddess into their home instead of leaving her bereft in the estate ruins.

places/willowshore/bones-of-the-forgotte.title: Bones of the Forgotten
places/willowshore/bones-of-the-forgotte.description:
Willowshore, like many remote villages, has its own set of laws. Grievous crimes were punished with exile unless the individual’s skill or knowledge was needed— the punishment was then permanent imprisonment. Executions were rare, as being exiled into Specterwood was often a death sentence in itself.
Particularly vile criminals had a Mark of Crime tattooed onto their scalp, and after death, this tattoo was transferred to the bones through carving, meaning even in death and decomposition, the mark remained. Bodies with a Mark of Crime—be it from Willowshore, another village, or Lung Wa—can only be buried in this overgrown and unkept area. While graves were unmarked in the past, a few wooden posts have been erected recently and paper shuriken hung off them, seemingly in silent protest that the ones buried beneath might have died an unjust death. Or perhaps this is an attempt to stave off the rise of a bitter, vengeful ghost.

places/willowshore/ceiba-creek.html.title: Ceiba Creek
places/willowshore/ceiba-creek.html.description: Links into Woodraft Lake

places/willowshore/ceiba-river.html.title: Ceiba River
places/willowshore/ceiba-river.html.description: Links into the Woodraft Lake alongside Ceiba Creek

places/willowshore/ceiba-duyue-exchange..title: Ceiba-Duyue Exchange
places/willowshore/ceiba-duyue-exchange..description: When Governor Heh Shan-Bao took office in Willowshore, he ordered several new warehouses and a trade office to be built here, hoping to expand the town’s industry and connection with the coastal fortress of Karahai. On Granny Hu’s advice, Shan-Bao handpicked the local Do-Yun priest, Kim Gu-won (male human cleric), to take the post of Exchange Manager. Gu-won reluctantly accepted the job, knowing that with what Granny Hu has on him, he wouldn’t be able to refuse. Wares: beverages, divine scrolls, foods and spices, fulus, raw mineral, textiles

places/willowshore/cerulean-teahouse.htm.title: Cerulean Teahouse
places/willowshore/cerulean-teahouse.htm.description:
Willowshore’s lumber bosses thought very highly of themselves, and the idea of mingling with the “common folk” rankled them. Aristocrat Qing Mai-Lai’s solution was the establishment of this fine structure, close to the lumber lords’ estates.
The Cerulean Teahouse took off quickly, thanks to its plentiful offerings of extravagant food, drinks, and performances. However, once the novelty wore off, business quickly died. Still, Mai-Lai persevered, first by changing the teahouse’s focus to banquet catering, then by collaborating with the Leshy's Saloon as a storefront, and finally as a flexible bed‑and-breakfast. Just days after Mai-Lai finally paid off the loan on the property, news of Lung Wa’s collapse reached Willowshore. Mai-Lai called it quits at that point and announced her retirement, but her attempts to transfer control of the Teahouse to family met with complications after it became apparent that none of her relations wanted to move to Willowshore. When Mai-Lai passed away early in the previous winter, ownership of the business was still undetermined, for Mai-Lai never submitted a will. Today, the Cerulean Teahouse stands vacant and is slowly falling into ruin

places/willowshore/dawnstep-bridge.html.title: Dawnstep Bridge
places/willowshore/dawnstep-bridge.html.description: After the Thrice‑Blessed Brothel was established (but before it became an inn), Willowshore’s population had grown enough in size to be considered a town by Shenmen standards, meaning that a lit lantern must be maintained at all times within the town near the entrance, at a major crossroads, or at a bridge. The lack of a lit lantern at one of these locations suggests that the town is abandoned, which is believed to invite vermin, ghosts, dangerous beasts, and worse. Today, Willowshore features two such lanterns, but the one that stands here, the Eternal Lantern, is both its oldest and most notable.

places/willowshore/dock.html.title: Dock
places/willowshore/dock.html.description: After the construction of the Willowshore Dam, Willowshore’s old dock was blocked off, thus requiring the construction of a new dock at the mouth of the Ceiba River. The new dock is operated and managed by Rajul Samudra (male nagaji shipwright), who was hired by the Ceiba-Duyue Exchange specifically for his boatbuilding skills.Wares: river boat rentals and sales

places/willowshore/duyue-river.html.title: Duyue River
places/willowshore/duyue-river.html.description: Links into Woodraft Lake

places/willowshore/fisheries.html.title: Fisheries
places/willowshore/fisheries.html.description: Fish is an important food source for Willowshore. Locals traditionally capture entire schools of fish, preserve those above a certain size, and raise small ones in their backyard ponds. Today, this practice has been expanded, though the fishers have yet to reach a point where the fishery ponds here can be maintained indefinitely. Zataku (female ratfolk fisher) is Willowshore’s foremost fish keeper; her ability to sense weather changes gives her the perfect edge in her occupation. Wares: dried or smoked fish and shrimp, fertilizer, fishing gear, insect bait

places/willowshore/graveside-manners.htm.title: Graveside Manners
places/willowshore/graveside-manners.htm.description: Willowshore’s residents practiced cremation in its early days to prevent undeath. The tombs in this old cemetery house the urns of many of those early settlers. Today, only a few families use Graveside Manners as a burial ground. The headstones remain free of lichen and moss thanks to the graveyard’s keeper, You So-Jin (female elf herbalist). Wares: alchemical elixirs and tools, alchemical reagents, fresh and dried herbs

places/willowshore/great-willow.html.title: Great Willow
places/willowshore/great-willow.html.description: Willowshore rests at the foot of a mountainous region known geographically as the Trimountains, named due to the three major peaks in the area. In her memoir, Master Zhi Hui noted how she found an ancient willow tree of unusual size at the summit of the lowest of these mountains. After befriending the kodama kami who protected the tree, Master Zhi Hui learned vital information that eventually led her to the Tan Sugi grove to the west. For this knowledge, the kodama of the so-called “Great Willow” has received much reverence from both Willowshore and visiting pilgrims over the years. Wares: foraged foods and nonmetallic raw materials

places/willowshore/lady-of-souls.html.title: Lady of Souls
places/willowshore/lady-of-souls.html.description: One of Lung Wa’s chief concerns when they first expanded into Willowshore was to reduce the likelihood of an undead uprising. They solved it by building a cathedral to Lady Jansoo. Elizeth Candora (female human cleric), a second-generation Taldan from Goka, is the current priestess here.Wares: consumable religious items, divine scrolls

places/willowshore/leshy's-saloon.html.title: Leshy's Saloon
places/willowshore/leshy's-saloon.html.description: The local leshies don’t recall when they came to the region, just that it was long before Willowshore was founded. They didn’t officially join Willowshore until the expansion of the settlement made it inevitable. With allied families keeping the greedy lumber lords away, the leshies built their own tea farm business, taking to the roads with brewed tea and teaware stashed in rectangular bamboo backpacks. Some would shout slogans, while others used a simple temple block to inform customers of their arrival. These traveling merchants soon became an attraction and staple of Willowshore life. Ever since the Cerulean Teahouse closed, Mountain Summit Grass (agender leshy teamaker), the leader of this band of leshies, has been increasingly focusing on creating bespoke blends of tea for individual local customers they favor. Wares: clay pottery tea ware, tea leaves

places/willowshore/luo-and-laws.html.title: Luo and Laws
places/willowshore/luo-and-laws.html.description: Lung Wa’s laws, after being revised time and time again by self-serving rulers, are a bag of contradictions allowing independent lawyers, such as Luo Xi Yang (female human lawyer), to make a decent living attempting to make sense of them. Promised by the lumber lords who invited her here that rural life would be less stressful, Xi Yang arrived with only the essential 10-volume Imperial Compendium. Quickly, the lawyer discovered that Willowshore’s legal issues were as complicated, if not more so, than what she’d previously encountered in the city of Sze, and thus her library grew to a size that doubled the one in her former home.

places/willowshore/matsuki-estate.html.title: Matsuki Estate
places/willowshore/matsuki-estate.html.description: Matsuki Shou

places/willowshore/mercantile-street.htm.title: Mercantile Street
places/willowshore/mercantile-street.htm.description: Willowshore’s newer businesses, particularly those associated with woodcarving, are mostly found in one of the two-storied red‑brick buildings along Mercantile Street. To ensure the lumber lords would never favor anyone, the woodcarvers came together to form a guild, through which young apprentices have the opportunity to intern at different shops during their apprenticeship. Yun Mong-Un (female human woodcarver), the woodcarver’s current elected guild leader, is a product of such training. Though heaped with praise for her work, Mong-Un would rather be a painter or jewelry maker. Wares: artwork, wood items, wooden religious symbols

places/willowshore/milling-houses.html.title: Milling Houses
places/willowshore/milling-houses.html.description: Willowshore has numerous millhouses, including two powered by water, three by wind, and ten powered by people or draft animals. The abundance ensures that losing one or two mills to routine maintenance or malfunction never jeopardizes the village’s needs. Work at the mills is intense, and the hours can be irregular due to the demand each day. The millers’ leader, Choe Chung-hu (male human miller), keeps morale high with encouragement, pushing back against unreasonable demands, keeping wages stable, and offering midnight snacks. Wares: De-husked grain, grain flour, stone objects

places/willowshore/minister-almantas-shr.title: Minister Almantas Shrine
places/willowshore/minister-almantas-shr.description: This darkwood-trimmed shrine houses a 3-foot-tall limestone statue of Minister Almantas that holds a shovel in one hand and a trowel in the other. The statue was reportedly taken to Goka first to ritualistically invite Minister Almantas’s divine blessings at the Grand Bank before being ferried back to Willowshore.

places/willowshore/mother’s-coil.html.title: Mother’s Coil
places/willowshore/mother’s-coil.html.description: Magic was traditionally seen in Willowshore as either a manifestation of divine blessing, one’s connection to the spirit world, or just a trick of the hand and mind. Most folks didn’t quite understand it as a topic to be studied and learned until the arrival of Anjal of Thulsadus, an old nagaji wizard. Arriving about 15 years ago, Anjal found the weather of Willowshore to be gentle on their dryscale condition and thus bought a plot of land from a farmer looking to relocate to the city of Sze. Overnight, a Nagajorstyled tower of dark basalt appeared, much to the awe of the villagers. Though curious about magic, most villagers find the topic to be formidable and unapproachable, not to mention impractical. Thus, Anjal had only one apprentice, Igawa Jubei, a child they raised after she was abandoned in Willowshore by a pair of irresponsible “parents” who posed as well-off merchants but then fled town without paying their bills. Infuriated that anyone dared endanger a child so, Anjal’s Lady Noromian beliefs prompted the old wizard to take the terrified Jubei in as their own. Jubei has since grown into a capable young adult. While Anjal’s death last year was tragic, Jubei is determined to continue studying the arcane arts through the books her adopted parent left behind. Wares: arcane and occult scrolls, formulas and recipes, wands

places/willowshore/mushroom-house.html.title: Mushroom House
places/willowshore/mushroom-house.html.description: This remote brick farmhouse smells of decay and manure. Everyone knows that mushrooms aren’t the only things growing in the farmhouse, though. For the right price, the Mushroom House can grow almost anything. Luda Bama (female halfling smuggler), a spry, elderly halfling woman, is the head of this illicit market, which she runs with the explicit permission of Granny Hu. Wares: adventuring gear, drugs, poisons, tattoos

places/willowshore/nine-ear-shrine.html.title: Nine Ear Shrine
places/willowshore/nine-ear-shrine.html.description:
This mud-wall hut looks like a grain storage hut from the outside. Its interior descends 10 feet underground into an enclosed space lined with stone, in the middle of which sits a 15-foot‑tall marble statue of a nine‑tailed fox. A large spiritual rope made of hay hangs off its neck. The walls of the basement are decorated with painted carvings that depict stories of Nayeli.
Fifteen years ago, a desperate mother of the Ouh Family hid her baby here as the family was rounded up for execution by a corrupt guard. By the time the guards learned about the missing offspring, a large skulk of foxes had surrounded the temple. Unwilling to tempt divine wrath, the guards retreated. Allies of the family soon arrived to rescue the baby, at which point the foxes vanished.
That baby, Ba-Ming Ouh (female human priest), grew up under the care of distant relatives. While she shows signs of the Ouh family’s inclinations toward the veneration of nature, Ba-Ming wishes to return her life debt by serving Nayeli. While some question her intentions, most Willowshorers support her dedication.Wares: fulus, scrolls, talismans

places/willowshore/second-best.html.title: Second Best
places/willowshore/second-best.html.description:
When Huo Tian-Zhe (male human inventor) arrived in Willowshore with his blacksmith father (Tian-Zhe's Father) from Karahai (Willowshore’s closest neighboring settlement to the east) about five years ago to assist with the maintenance of the Willowshore Dam, the urban-born son thought he was about to show the “second-rated smiths of the countryside” how to get things done. Quickly, Tian-Zhe realized his own skills were subpar to even the youngest apprentice of the Eternal Blaze Ironworks and that his fancily-designed farm gadgets were more akin to toys than machines of marvels. Humbled, Tian‑Zhe asked his father to stay in Willowshore so he could learn to be a “smith of use.” Begrudgingly accepting the abrupt request, Tian-Zhe’s father nevertheless gave his son a handful of gold to order a new shop sign. As a reminder to himself, Tian-Zhe boldly named his workshop “Second Best.”
In the last five years, Tian-Zhe’s products have garnered some loyal customers, and his knowledge of machinery won over Yong Wu-Xiu such that the old smith tasked him with the maintenance of the dam.Wares: adventuring tools, alchemical ammunition, alchemical bombs, clockwork gadgets, and simple armor, metal weapons, and shields

places/willowshore/silvermist-lodges.htm.title: Silvermist Lodges
places/willowshore/silvermist-lodges.htm.description: The Silvermist Lodges are split between two small compounds in the woods south of town. At each location, the lodges’ woodwork conforms to the grain of the wood, giving the buildings an organic look associated with elven architecture. In the days when Willowshore first tried to become self‑sufficient, eight elven adventurers came and took up an offer to settle in the village, seeing the request as a short-term contract given their life spans. Though none of these original eight elves live in Willowshore anymore, they left many offspring and descendants behind. Wares: animal parts, snare supplies

places/willowshore/spider-gate.html.title: Spider Gate
places/willowshore/spider-gate.html.description:
After the Night of Broken Blades, Willowshore’s governor caved to the demand for a new lantern at the entrance of the town to augment the protection afforded by the Eternal Lantern at the town’s heart. While the original plan was for the carpenters of Willowshore to build a tori gate or Tian-shu gateway on which lanterns could be hung, a Lung Wa aristocrat offered a free stone guardian spider from his garden since it no longer fit in with the garden’s decorations.
Most Willowshorers thought the giant statue was the ugliest thing they’d ever seen. Nevertheless, they assumed the statue housed a guardian spirit and respected it accordingly. In time, villagers accepted their unique entrance guardian, even adopting it as their mascot and naming it “Ugly Cute.” The lantern Ugly Cute holds in its fangs is a regular lantern, unlike the Eternal Lantern found at Dawnstep Bridge, but the people of Willowshore value it just as much and strive to keep it lit at all times.

places/willowshore/the-hand-of-spring.ht.title: The Hand of Spring
places/willowshore/the-hand-of-spring.ht.description: Willowshore relied heavily on home remedies, herbal droughts, and traveling priests for medical care until the arrival of Doctor Damihansig Mababangloob (male human doctor), whom everyone calls Dami for short. Dami uses a mix of acupuncture, purified chemicals, and surgery to provide care. Though his treatments aren’t what Willowshore is used to, Dami has developed quite a reputation for being a charitable doctor who cares more about his patients than monetary gain. Wares: alchemical healing items, healer’s kit supplies, nonmagical healing items

places/willowshore/thrice-blessed-inn.ht.title: Thrice-Blessed Inn
places/willowshore/thrice-blessed-inn.ht.description: Willowshore’s Thrice-Blessed Inn began as the Thrice‑Blessed Brothel, for it was founded by three clerics of Do-Yun, Nekane Modis, and Nayeli. Political complications forced the brothel’s owner, Mother Otis (genderfluid half-elf innkeeper), to shut down the establishment only a few years before Lung Wa’s collapse. With the aid of Willowshore’s local lawyer, Luo Xi Yang, Mother Otis was able to rely upon an obscure law that prevented their eviction and allowed them to continue to operate the building as an inn.

places/willowshore/willowshore-dam.html.title: Willowshore Dam
places/willowshore/willowshore-dam.html.description: Willowshore’s dam is a minor engineering marvel. Its main body is constructed out of immense, precisely fitted slabs of dark‑gray marble, carved with a carefully calculated curvature. The dam has two giant wooden gates that can be closed or opened to lower the level of the lake. Turning the wheel that controls the gates automatically causes a bell to ring, signaling anyone downriver to move away to safetyWoodraft Lake

places/willowshore/willowshore-stables.h.title: Willowshore Stables
places/willowshore/willowshore-stables.h.description: Willowshore Stables is the town’s veterinary facility for household animals, pets, and livestock. Incidentally, Willowshore Stables’ use of livestock as beasts of burden influenced the village’s food culture, causing many households to avoid the consumption of beef. The owner, Kum Soon-chong (male human veterinarian), and his teenage son, Meng-sung (male human veterinarian), are well-known for their affable attitudes and compassion for all kinds of animals.Wares: animal rentals, barding, saddle bags, land vehicles

places/willowshore/woodraft-lake.html.title: Woodraft Lake
places/willowshore/woodraft-lake.html.description:
The First Willowshore Governor appointed by Lung Wa made an effort to tame the notorious Ceiba River through various engineering feats. Part of that effort, plus the demand for wet storage for wood, led to the construction of the Willowshore Dam—and by extension, Woodraft Lake.
Many protested the construction at first, as the resulting lake would submerge some homes and farmlands—including the village’s shrine to Nekane Modis. A few imprisonments later, all complaints ceased. The dam was completed in due time. While the governor earned themself a promotion and left Willowshore soon after, they didn’t get to enjoy before a landslide buried them on a bright sunny day. While the story’s veracity is somewhat dubious, subsequent governors have never stopped Willowshore’s villagers from treating the lake as a shrine to the Widow of Suffering.

places/willowshore-hinterlands/willowsho.title: Willowshore Hinterlands
places/willowshore-hinterlands/willowsho.description:
Beyond the town’s borders lies the rugged terrain of its hinterlands—rolling forested hills rising to verdant mountains to the west, while to the east, the region’s largest river eventually flows into the Sea of Ghosts. Where this river meets the sea stands Willowshore’s closest neighbor, the coastal fortified market called Karahai, yet even this location is a day’s ride from town.
The immediate hinterlands feature a number of minor sites of interest. The Duyue River is the largest waterway in the region with Willowshore founded on one of its tributaries, the Ceiba River. A shallower tributary, Dragonfly Creek, winds south to an open area of rugged stone known as the Gorge of Fangs and Teeth—a natural quarry that supplied the stone for Willowshore’s roads and foundations. Gourd Lake, downriver from Willowshore, provides excellent fishing, but those who would ply its waters would do well to make offerings to the kappas who dwell in its depths and cavort on its southern shores. Green Silk Peak, nearly 2,000 feet high, is the highest point of elevation in the hinterlands, while the natural sinkholes known as the The Fox’s Eyes are the opposite—barren pits in the ground where nothing grows and gritty water has pooled.
Signs of habitation beyond Willowshore are sparse in the region, but they do exist and are largely abandoned. To the northeast stand the burnt-out ruins of an abandoned roadhouse once known as Canary Inn, while a remote Hunter’s Hut stands near the headwaters of the Duyue River. To the north can be found an old expansion once intended to support Willowshore, but these buildings and farms were soon abandoned when it became apparent the stream that flowed through the area tended to dry up at random intervals each year. To the west, near the source of the Ceiba River, are the remains of the old Lumber Camp abandoned a few years ago by the local lumber lords—a location that’s slowly being reclaimed by the forest. And in the low mountains northwest of town, at the far end of the trail known as Pilgrim's Path, stand the ruins of the Tan Sugi Monastery—a place reputed today to be the den of monsters, ghosts, or worse
The forest surrounding Willowshore is part of the much larger woodland known as Specterwood, although here in Willowshore’s hinterlands, the haunts and ghosts notorious for plaguing these woods aren’t as dangerous. Wildlife is abundant with deer and boars making up the primary large game in the region, and more dangerous predators like black bears, wolves, giant stag beetles, and enormous spiders comprise the greater perils of the hinterlands to those who travel too far from the roads or explore the wilds after dark.

We dress zhu up in his armor, send him into the Imperial Barracks Cackling as a trap is set off Zhu: i thought i told you to not set it off “Apologies! Please dont take us to the tea house!”
The teahouse?
“Yes! The teahouse! With um. The lord. Lord Mo Duoquo!” You think youre so good to go to the teahouse! “We dont want him to kill us!” The teahouse would be a luxury to what youve earned! Some associates of mine are to walk in, what of other traps? “Want us to take them down?” Yes, and throw one of yourselves on it. Least favorite Which guy did you let out?? “Dont worry abt it my liege!” “They were gonna send a villager to the teahouse but he escaped and ran away” Zhu messages the real guard, telling him to play along, hes a bad performer “They call him the great butcher! Thats what they call him! I dont like him!” We unlock the jail cell, take the armory key, and pretend to lock it back We jump the creatures and the guards free the other prisoners
Governor's Home appears to be gone?? Lion statues are still there, but everything else is just missing, flat ground
Governor Heh Shan-Bao has been here for like 3-4 years and his beliefs align more north (will come back to this with more details!) Teahouse Unlock the door Corpses in the teahouse
One is granny hu’s daughter Granny Hu's Daughter
12 people in the room, one is Yun Mong-Un (Shizuka’s aunt/guardian) They all seem to be who they say they are We free them We enter the building and try to sneak past a frog?? We fail at that Shizuka tries to tame the big ass frog, it decides to leave us alone “Ah hello! You must be the new entertainment” Define it? “A song? A dance? Lighten it up?” Would you like to join the people in the rafters “Ehhhh” “I havent tried autoerotica asphixiation. You want me to try it on you?” He offers us some rice wine, extending his long neck 20ft to us Mr fluffy whiskers the attack ferret Dead body in the room is the miller who was supposed to pick us up after the festival in the morning He and zhu decide to be upside down Fight, kill him We get mr fluffy whiskers on our side Get financial paperwork
Says that theres a mildly difficult thing for Qing Mai-Lai’s inheritance. First person or group that gets pearls from Jiyong’s eyes
Location north (The Fox’s Eyes) that Lord Jiyong was buried in, perhaps it is related to that Level 3

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-4.htm.title: Session 4
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-4.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 3
Next Session: Session 5
Willowshore, Downtown Willowshore Investigating the silverware sounds Town guards are fighting off the silverware situation as we approach They will win eventually but. Swarms are nasty
Sentient apron trying to strangle Zheng Peng to death
Sanmi Nadoya also here, clutching her eyes, lots of blood, clutching her head Her eyes have been irreparably damaged from being in a silverware swarm “Thank you all for saving my life again” Yes ofc
“I saw some fishermen down by the Ceiba River” Wasnt the river not safe? “I’m not sure, I was in jail”
“I heard some disturbance in the Happy Kappa” Gremlins are fleeing, you wouldn’t happen to know whats up with that right Yeah we killed their leader Oh hell yeah We go to investigate the river
Floating boards, familiar nagaji man pulling a soaking wet rat (Zataku) out of a lake (Rajul Samudra) Father what’s going on? “Ah hello daughter! You’re intact? Fairing well? Yes, no help from you. Whats going on here? “Zataku and i were here when the mists descended, we thought we’d take some important items and get out of here, but suddenly we were surrounded and grasping hands tore up our boat until the current pushed us up to the shore.” Anyone injured? “Mostly cuts and scrapes but Im more worried abt the other fishers who went out “Once the mist lifted i saw some crashed boats but I’ve sort of been trying to keep my friend here (the rat) from drowning” okay,,..., “Things seem a lot safer we can go look?” Yeha we’ve been working on it “Oh nice good uh… good job. Very proud of you my daughter.” I really appreciate it Father. Wow this is intensely awkward “Anyways we are going to look for more boats now” If you run into anything you are certian you cannot handle PLEASE come find us. We will deal with it Dont worry I dont need to send my child to stand in front of me.
I can handle myself father PLEASE. Just let us know if you need help. We have dealt with so much around town we cleared out the Dawnstep Bridge and Downtown Willowshore Were there gremlins there Yeah a good amount and a silverware parade. Several sentient bugs and a large frog Sounds pretty tough yeah!!!!! Also a rokurokubi, we dealt with that. Its been a long day. You do know I am a part of this, it’s not just them doing it? Oh well. Neat! Anyways im going to go make sure nobody else crashed their boat in that fog. Do you have a weapon in case? I mean it was just some fog and a couple… You never know. (gives him a dagger) “Thanks”
Granny Hu, Ceiba-Duyue Exchange Same ppl there as last time, a few more stragglers “Ah how does it go?’
Hello granny, we came to let you now, your son in law Zheng Peng, we have found and rescued him. But also bringing bad news, we have found your daughter (Granny Hu's Daughter) in the Cerulean Teahouse. I’m very sorry for your loss granny Her general stoicism, calm granny vibes less for a minute as she pardons herself “Excuse me, I-I need a moment”
Kim Gu-won takes reports on our behalf of the town being liberated and switched to pieces to show whats been solved We mention we killed the creature that killed her daughter We fully debrief her Asking Kim Gu-won if anything else has been occurring in this area “We’ve been dealing with rescuing farmers from their homes and checking the houses down the river. Nothing we couldn't handle so far. I’d expect with the leader defeated and the mist clearing, things will be very fortuitous Have you all made any contact with south willow shore? “No, focused on this area Some things get cleared out, end of the day, long rest
Guiying checking in with the leshies at Leshy's Saloon and helping out with cleanup around town Help with debris to get to houses that are closed off. Leshies are good, mountain summit grass gets my help Kavi Dealing with haunts, helping those in the river
Focus on downtown 1st, notice a lot of general concern about the missing Governor's Home, but beyond Kavi’s understanding. Successfully clear downtown of traps and haunts Zhu helping medically, haunt sight Shizuka scouting the edge of the woods, trying to find people Find a hunter who has been gravely injured by a trap in the woods, are able to bring her back to town She lets her know abt where the others are, they can be gotten
Katsu helping at Old Man Matsuki
Kawaka Myna, his shop (Cloud Paper House) will be replacing paper sliding doors that were destroyed so very busy Also trying to find someone to create portraits of those who died without one so they can be displayed at funeral
He’s working on repairs of Matsuki Estate, hands list of the dead to katsu Shizuka sleeps in a haunted-ish area of town She’s okay but in the night, she hears some kind of disturbance Strange clattering noise in the night, coming from some locked doors further in the estate Gives a fright in the middle of the night
Stone rubbing against each other as a creature drags itself further into the Abandoned Estates Exchange, granny hu is doing a little better but still having a rough time
“Normally i’d send my son in law, but he is not in his right mindset considering what happened. Someone needs to go to Karahai, tell them about the disaster, and get a priest of Lady Jansoo to give the dead their rights.” Two paths to Karahai, the Treacherous Trail and a slightly safer path using the river Dangerous journey to Karahai, a day’s journey out Approaching nightfall, threatening to rain all day but hasnt yet
As we are a little past Gourd Lake We notice that we go from being able to see the town off in the distance to, as we approach, we see a large barrier A giant wall of mist Zhu walks through it, finds himself walking back out in the direction of his friends despite walking in a straight line No matter how many times we try to move forward, the fog grows. Its not visible until we get close, and then suddenly it thickens until we return to the spot we’ve left Horses are very upset, refuse to approach the wall Shizuka protects us from the rain Guiying was almost abt to set the tent up by the river that was slowly rising Set up tree to mark where the mist is Another day travel As we arrive back in town, people stop to ask us where the priest is, but also the strange merchant that has arrived and set up shop in willowshore Wtf merchant?
Asahina Shinzo and Yiz? Bird has a mask on Associated with Judge jiansoo Strange time to be in town! “Perhaps! But yknow. I go where im needed.” What are u selling “Many items. Objects. I have many items if you wish to purchase one on the house. Let me know!” Bird squawks at him Where did u come from? “Oh ykno.” Who are you? “Shinzo. Im a travelling merchant :)” He wont teach us how to get thru the barrier What have you seen? We explain what just happened with the town “I dont know much about that, I just hope that my wares can be useful to you all” Where are you going next? “Well out and about and I’ll be back” “I have to be gone by dawn tomorrow.” “Im just a simple seller of wares. Please let me know if theres anything i can attempt to requisition in your rebuilding of the city” He seems like he cant lie, hes not very good at it, he clearly has chosen useful items to sell to us and to discount them extremely heavily. Theyre items we normally would get here. Hes unwilling to help more than that, or unable? He seems very firm on that being the line. He’s also observing us Is this the first time youve come to town? “Nnnno? Ive been by before.” “I have a very forgettable face. I wont be offended if you dont remember me” Subtle message to him - if you wish to pretend to be human, at least pretend we did a favor for you “I do hope you get some gold the next time i come by, my first time customer discount only happens once.” He doesn’t realize that a spell is cast, just talks directly back as though you said it aloud He understands kitsune and all other languages presumably He hasnt sold anything to anyone in town bc theyre nervous He has rations they could purchase though Both granny hu and matsuki want to be in charge of the town
Tell matsuki, granny hu, Damihansig Mababangloob, and kazuma oono about the mist Matsuki brings us some of his prized wine Granny Hu discreetly offers for us to become part of her “network of individuals” (her gang) that all have a spider lily tattoo “How was your quest to find the priest?” Theres a slight issue with that quest. There appears to be a wall of magical mist 3 miles out that way that sends you back when you try to cross “Oh no” We havent tried other directions but based on that, we cant head out that way. So we have to deal with the dead ourselves “Well that is certainly worrying that we might be trapped within here (takes a drink). I supposed we should tell the people Hu: “Well theres no need to cause a panic Matsuki: “Well how shall we prepare if this lasts until winter. We cant trade supples Tells them about the merchant and his offers and that hes nice “You know who might know something about this? That old willow, the kami. Its roots surely extend quite far” Hu: “Bah superstition, we should focus on defending the town” Telling her we’ve seen ghosts
Hu: “Wheres that governor? Well supernatural shit happened. His mansion is gone. Matsuki: “Yeah I think that sounds about right” Oono: “You know what? I’m not sure if this is related to the wall or anything. Remember when the inn burned down in 7105? Maybe the criminal that burned to death had a grudge against the governor. Not that anyone could have a grudge against our infallible governor.”’
Dami: “I hate to point this out, where Ugly Cute is?” We’re pretty sure it wandered into the woods, southeast? Dami: “What if it wandered toward the exit? Its our spiritual protector. Surely it knows things” They argue/ grumble back and forth about the mist and interim governor Plan: Funeral rites - katsu & zhu Snuff out shapechanger - shizuka & guiying Clear out haunts - kavi

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-5.htm.title: Session 5
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-5.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 4
Next Session: Session 6 Scubby is very cute
Willowshore Summer 5th, 7108
Kavi clearing haunts, asking Igawa Jubei to investigate the mist wall Zhu is burying the dead
Things are not going well with Elizeth Candora She keeps insisting that the way they’re doing things is wrong Alcohol is strong today, no strong rebuttal Guiying shizuka snuffing out shapechangers
Doing Downtown Willowshore first Feel confident that they clear everyone who’s downtown Katsu compiling list of the dead, portraits Summer 6 Jubei comes back “Basically the conclusion ive come to, is that we have to find someone- you could trial and error the boundaries or find someone who can sense the area. Like a dryad anything that owns the valley, should know what the borders of it are
Isnt there a spirit in the tree up north, Great Willow? “You think hes still there? Maybe if hes still there it doesnt hurt to check “Sure, do you need help making a gift?” I need a gift?
“I mean dad always made a gift of wine. I can help, do you know someone who knows about spirits?” Matsuki Zone
Around midafternoon they visit the Willowshore Stables, notice that Meng-sung seems unsteady G: you ok? “Why of course! How about you?” G: you seem unshakey. “Who wouldn’t be after what we endured!” G: you seem… almost drunk. Have you been drinking? “No you must be smelling the bowl on me, its only natural i smell of alcohol. It must be the heat.” G: if you have something to say you should tell me
Kum Soon-chong: “How could you say such things of my son! My hardworking boy! There must be some misunderstanding! I know you left for a while so you might not remember my boy, he’s always been introverted and quiet?” G: has he always acted like a shapechanger? SM: “How unkind! Get out of here!” Guiying grabs him by the collar, punches him
Yong Wu-Xiu looks and decides its not her problem
You So-Jin is concerned G: i believe this is a shapechanger, im dealing with him “Wh- guiying you cant just beat people in the street!” G: a better idea? “What kind?” G: the kind that changes shape? “Perhaps a trial??? If you have no way of proving theyre shapechangers??” Guiying knocks him out Yeah hes unconscious “Please guiying remember your meditation techniques its not you!” G: this is faster than a trial! Hes suspicious. If im wrong ill buy him a meal Shizuka feels along the face, doesnt seem like theres an edge of a mask. Same with guiying G: ok well i guess i was wrong “I think you should come back another time you two.” Ruohan having an ok time Able to notice an error Elesbeth was making
Was a servant of Lady Jansoo, Shepard of souls, while the people of this town worship Judge Jiansoo, judge of souls Able to correct it It seems as tho maybe 20-30 people that died but the city feels emptier than it should Like the leatherworks; the owners arent among the dead, but they arent there About 300 people in town, about 250 currently in town The numbers arent quite right, only Zhu notices Zhu: 30 people are missing still “IDK what you mean? Maybe some farmers but all the people that i know… theyre either here amongst the dead or ive seen them!” Kavi: the town does seem very empty comparatively “The towns been declining over the years. I remember a few months ago when it was a bustling town but thats just not accurate anymore. When the lumberlords left it shot everyone in the foot” Zhu: Ok theres still 30 people missing
“Okay ill let Granny Hu know about that. If you could provide any of their names, that would be great”
Zhu gives the Rebel's Leatherworks, its hard to remember what their names were tho Kavi notices that theyre being followed by footsteps but theres no one behind them Kavi decides to go back and waves some more items of divorced people around Summer 7 G S Giftbasket to the guy from yesterday Clean the farm “Maybe if we hadnt chosen these sacrifices something else mightve happened. Something mustve gone wrong with the festival” Kavi Really good day, managed to clear out a section Ruohan Dead time Katsu Portraits Summer 8 G S
Shapechanger Dock Katsu Kavi Art Summer 9 Day of the funeral Ruohan leads a significant portion? For the right price (15 bottles, 2 at least good) “After this, in the network, we have connections to those uh- if you want smth stronger. Is all im saying.” Cocaine???? Granny hu is literally a drug dealer People are able to take a breath, calm down, maybe this was a one off thing Soon the fog will lift and everything will be fine surely :) The general populace thinks zhu is like a crazy little religious guy Summer 10 Kavi Haunts to clear
Igawa Jubei hasnt found much about the fog, gonna go check it herself Be careful, you dont know whats out there “Yeah I just wanna check it out. We dont know if its a circle” Yeah but you’ll have to go thru the forest, idk if thats something you wanna do alone “Yeah well idk how else to do it, if you havent spoken to the kami yet I’ll talk to the kami in the coming days Zhu is breaking into the leatherworkers Seems undamaged Sniffs leather, smells fresh 1 red butterfly that flaps out the window that zhu went through Goes out of town Repeats this for every tradesperson zhu doesnt remember
Jadeite Essentials Distilling equipment destroyed, but could be fixed Zhu doesnt remember who owned this place Zhu takes their cart Lot of abandoned shops Guiying Farm day Shizuka and Katsu Shapechangers docks Seem sure that its clean As night falls, zhu’s sister visits and gives him a gift Shes not sure how useful itll be “And also please dont mention i can craft things like this to anyone” Hands him a weapon she worked diligently on for someone whos only able to smith pots Summer 11 Zhu heals the son Zhu: unmask “A mask??? Im not sure what you mean?” Zhu: i was just asking you to unmask It works Z: why are you doing this? I can command you to kill yourself or we talk this out “Oh no need to do that. You see, well. Once enough people have been sacrificed, we will ascend to the promised lands. Our vengeance- our promised land will happen when we wipe out the town.” Z: you should be more clear about these things. Whats your opinion “I need more time to decide whos right. Im just here. Keeping an eye on things. Waiting for…” G: you sacrificed him? “No, i still had his face. Which means hes alive.” Z: where is he? “West. In the camp?” Z: the camp! “I mean. So. she has to do the ritual a couple times. And then we’ll, yknow, ascend to the promised land. Itll be great.” “We’re owed our vengeance and destruction ont eh town. But as long as i have his face they have a good reason to keep him alive!” G: who is she? “Oh. you know.”
“Zhuo-do. She is… yknow. Doing some rituals.” Kavi: what do they involve?
“My understanding, the day before the full moon, she sacrifices the mortal soul to the great fiend to be consumed by it forever, and he grants her great and terrible power.” G: os whyd you get something out it? “Whatd i do, live in town?” “You guys beat the shit out of me” Z: you are impersonating a missing person “This holy great terrible powerful, i go to the promised beyond, im drawn to that.” “The human sacrifice is pretty key.” “We’re gonna go together, its a door, we’re gonna go through it…” Kat: doesnt this sound like youd get sacrificed too? “Nnnoo. Not really? Im not like you guys.” Z: i have seen one of your spirits before, it went to hell, screamed the whole time. “Im gonna hope thats a metaphor.” Z: no, but i wish it was “Whos to say thats not where im from?” G: we keep you alive, you lead us to the real guy “Ooorrr i put his face back on, nobody panics, and he gets to stay alive for another month or two.” Z: we lock you in prison and i impersonate him
bully him into going to prison so he doesnt die Imperial Barracks [message to the dad, Dad: “Oh how terrible Kavi: Everything will be alright, well get him back D: I have half a mind to march there and get him myself K: I dont think thats a good idea, we have a very capable group, we’ll get him We reassure him that we’ll rescue the son K: Just think if anything happened to you while he was missing, he would be quite sad
Zheng peng, this guy is a shapechanger “Why dont we kill him” Bc theres hostages, you dont want to kill hostages Detained for suspicious activity, possessed by spirits (locked up for his own safety) WHO DO THE SAVIORS OF THE TOWN ENDORSE?
Kazuma oono :)
“Only old people in the running. Matsuki, Granny Hu, someone else?” You of course “ME?????” “I suppose if i WERE governor id make changes.” Policies dont matter but he should just be elected (he has rlly specific opinions abt the governor. The next play was gonna be about a local governor and it usually paints the governor in a not great light. Every year he puts it on it gets a lliiiitle more pointed.) “If theres no song, no festivals, we might as well be dead. Also taxes. Dont get me started on the way we’ve been taxing–” “But actually do all 5 of you endorse me???” Zhu + (blackmailed by zhu) guiying + katsu
Visiting the Great Willow “Ah who goes there! My name is kavi, these are my friends Zhu offers a gift of wine and sushi “Oh gifts! I like sushi! Stares at it until it disappears “What can i do for you? We saw that this area is encircled by mist. We were hoping you knew something about where this mist ends Fungus patch on the tree “Oh the mist! Yes the mist. The first day i sensed the mist a little bit ago or a long time ago. So i went to go see my friend except she wasnt there. And my friend is gone. And i cant even think about the mist cause im so worried about my friend. I cant hear anyone else, no other spirits What friend are you talking about? “She was another great willow tree just like me” There should be a lot of willow spirits in this areas, not usually visible but based on stories there should be a lot of them for him to talk to Fungus isnt natural, he should be able to take it off Kavi scrapes at it with her blade and it grows back right away We see a trail of fungus showing where he walk Did you see any of this fungus when you went to visit “Yes and it hurt me! Perhaps we can clear it out “Yes good good! If my friend is found, i might be able to think clearer 5 miles away Grove of willows is indeed covered in all kinds of fungus A little mushroom creature will emerge near it, xungu “Ohhhh come here to help me? Ive been chased out of my colony im so sad.. An evil tree chased me away, i have many secrets to share, but i am very shy, i will only share it with one of you.” Zhu makes the earth explode, combat Mold shrinks and evaporates It looks like no spirits here, at least none willing to reveal themselves to us Kavi: we’re here on the behalf of the great willow, we dont mean any harm, we just wanted to get rid of the fungus. Let us know if you need any assistance The grove stays quiet No tracks except from the local animals “Hello! Look how good my tree looks now! K: it looks great “I can find no other tree spirits around, we’re trapped here, about 10-16 miles around, a potent evil to the west (likely the camp), no way out, ensure there is enough food to last the season. Can’t find any spirits. I reached out but cant find any spirits around me K: well try to investigate further “I hope you didnt see them slaughtered K: no the trees were fine but we didnt see any spirits “Let me know if you need any help, here is a gift” Spiritual rope Cures guiying of the poison Next steps: Interrogate guy in prison, figure out what we can about the camp, how many ppl, etc Prepare for that and head on out unless theyre too strong for us

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-6.htm.title: Session 6
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-6.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 5
Next Session: Session 7
Willowshore Summer 11
Tell Igawa Jubei that we talked to the Great Willow She stops her plans to go out there, she gets some parchment to go on a daily trip to his mountain with maps of the area where the boundaries actually are
Ask the guards to leave the jail Imperial Barracks for a sec
Zheng Peng says he has smth for our ears only “I mean if its not inconveniencing you. Come into the armory for a moment.”
“Im sure we’ve all noticed the Governor's Home is gone. So is he. And there are spirits and ghosts about. And. so. As you may remember, there was word maybe… 3 years ago, there were some dangerous outlaws in the area. They never arrived at willowshore. The inn burned down at that time, they were apprehended by the town guard. Well. those of us there that evening… the Governor took it into his own hands to deal w the problem, they pulled up the fugitives, the inn keeper as a hostage, the governor’s decision was to start a small fire to get them to leave. So that we might apprehend them. It was… they were instead trapped within and they burnt to death. We tried to bury what was left but… as we were all sworn to secrecy, we had no priest to do any of the proper rituals, we did our best to find their skeletons amongst the remains and bury them. As they burned, the main fugitive cursed the governor, and seeing as you saved me… perhaps that might be… good to know, i guess? Maybe its related to the cause.” Its possible, was there anyone else the governor mightve angered?
“Well. a number of noblemen upset. And i… hes a very accomplished man on paper, but he was sent here… and to my understanding, my mother in law would know the exact details, he made a number of enemies in the Sze and was then sent here directly by Cho Ming Sa who… Jorogumo, spider women, they as a year ago- the empire is collapsing, they’ve taken this country. They did also kill the leader of our nation. Cho Ming Sa. she is dead. What i heard, the day after they executed her, she showe up to court anyway. She is, to my understanding, is a ghost along with other members of the court. They dont understand that they died. It might be related to all the ghosts here? She caused the Night of Broken Blades 40 years ago! There was a great, ancient tree in the monastery that she wanted cut down.” Turning people zombie-like Guiying remembers as people left they would slap a talisman on the monastery to assuage their guilt, but it seems strange “The best theory ive got is that the ghost up in the burned down inn is somehow responsible. Maybe they possessed the governor? IDK” Hi prisoner Whats involved in the ritual “It lasts a couple days, and i thiiink i saw some chanting? They’re pretty protective of the ritual area.” You havent seen it? “Its right by the camp.” But you havent been involved? “No, but they have a big alter.” Thats kind of pathetic, isnt it? “The alter should be bigger?” No, killing people and not even being allowed onto the site
“IDK. i still dont know if i agree more with Zhuo-do or Mujiro. I can see why they might not like a fencehopper-” Mujiro? “He wants us all to leave the camp and destroy the city.” So youre middleground? “I like being outside the camp. But also, going to the promised land seems pretty good.” It seems weird that you think the promised land exists “Of course it does” How do you know? “she said it exists. And what would the wall of fog be anyway?” A curse “For you all.” Are you not affected? We met a guy who went through the mist, he didnt say anything about the promised land “Maybe it goes different places for different people” What happens if you die before you do the ritual? “I assume that i’ll be reborn.” Only you, or can all shapechangers go to the promised land? “I think all? Even non shapechangers. But you might not like it.” Whats so good about it “Many faces to steal. Many things to mimic, itll be normal to mimic things. Many challenges for those who enjoy the killing and stabbing. We will be with the powerful Creator. So. y’know.” Is this in a way not the promised land? “I guess. But IDK if there will be jails int eh promised land.” Yes for traitors. I killed a guy last week. If the promsioed land lets you kill freely, whats to stop you from being killed How many are involved in the ritual? “4 or 5. They switch out. Not many of those in the camp are good at stealing faces. Let alone cast arcane magics. Zhuo-do are the only one who can do divine abilities.” “Zhuo-do read his aura and said he was very old.” Youre still believing her? “Yeah. and i ahev to decide between killing and sacrificing. But its my firmly held belief that one of these is the right thing to do.”
Do you believe that the god will protect the people int he camp? “Those worthy, surely.” Then why not have a quick selection, we go there, we die, and only the worthy are left “You can go there. Are you not familiar with the area?” I am
“Oh its the Lumber Camp.” Whats worthiness? “He’d say you were worthy. I bet he’d like you on his side. You have a great evil within you.” How many are in your camp? “Like 20?” In the camp or altogether? “In the camp.” How many outside? “We keep having some wander in from the woods, i wanna say like 30? I certainly have trouble believing im the only one in town.” Know anyone else seeking the promised land? “I suppose he’ll be in the camp. The old man. The farmer man.” Do you know whats going on with the people that nobody seems to remember? “I mean. Maybe. The people around them got very scared when people took their face off and forgot?” No, theres empty houses Oh boy zhu has a plan How are you doing “Fine.” Would you like smth to drink “...sure” Give him a bottle Something thats fun when youre passing time, try to balance smth on your head if you would be so kind Hopefully im not too drunk for this- (needle darts at the bottle) Keeps handing him bottles to do this Do you- here, i know you want to take a swing at me. Everyone does. “Uh not really.” Listen. I want to continue this game, its fun to drink until i miss. But TBH i dont want to be the one to kill you “Why?” Your friends will do it for me. As you can tell, i am very drunk rn. I came upwith this plan while drunk, so all magic will reveal im truthful You already talked, you gave us info, so youll coordinate with us sooner or alter “Wdym” Answer some questions Who exactly has been replaced that you know of?
“The old farmer (Kum Soon-chong. We were gonna do the smith next.” Which one? “The one thats good at her job.” Ah i see. (divine lance actually aiming at him) “Theres a group northside, but we’ve intentionally not told each other.” Do you know what happens to those who are sacrificed? Those who fail are stuck to people like me. “You have more ghosts than we have sacrificed” You remember reincarnation. What makes your cycle different? “I didnt think i had enough of a soul to be a ghost” You do “So ill be around forever.” People killed by me will be attached to me. Do you think your voice will be understood amongst the others? “Itd be fun” I mostly pee and masturbate, its not fun “I dont do either” You dont urinate? “No, i drink thru my hands and it leaves thru the soles of my feet. How else would it be?” Your patron. Shes a divine caster. Does she have a symbol? “Yyyyes.” “She has a book she carries with her at all times. She has… theres of course the shrine. She has a red butterfly?” Ive seen a few of those before. (yeah shes a witch. AP overwritten) Will you be kind and forthcoming about all of the abilities. Your shapechanging is fine, very seethrough, but fine. Could you tell me the abilities in the camp have before we go there? “Well. stealing faces. Zhuo-do steals part of your identity too? It takes a piece of your soul or smth. Its disorientating having your face stolen, but when its done by her- its additionally disorientating. She has a knife. Also a twisted piece of wood is the symbol.” Whats the meaning of the butterfly “They come out of the wall sometimes? She says theyre an important creature….” You dont know what meaning is, do you “Theyre red and theyre butterflies, they come from paradise, maybe theyre messengers, speak to her.” Theres a bloodthirsty guy but not as powerful as zhuo-do
Leave, go grab Kazuma Oono “What brings you my door so late! Oh- hi all of you.” Zhu turns human. WHICH ONE OF US LOOK MORE LIKE THE OLD MAN Oono turns human. Handsome older man, greying Disguises guiying to look like the old man
Walking back, there is a fearful convo between zheng peng granny hu and co
It appears that granny hu's grandson and Nadoya’s granddaughter Sanmi Yuli have both gone missing When did you last see them? “Just yesterday, last night! We’ve been searching all day. When i woke up this morning he was gone!” Guiying ‘sneaking’ in with a knife, disguised as the old man anything you wish to confess before you die? He starts praying outloud “I offer thee my name, unbind me (etc) i offer thee my soul, great Ku-” Before he gets the name out, he coughs as a red butterfly comes out of his body, he slumps over to the ground. Not dead but dying Healed by zhu Ok back to granny hu Hu believed she could find them herself, but she couldnt It reflects poorly on her that she couldnt find her own grandson, but she is getting the guards involved Hu Lelong, Sanmi Yuli No signs of break in and some of their things are missing Clothes Are they friends? “Absolutely not.” Zhu sleeping on Oono’s couch Shizuka looking for trails out of the houses She has a book abt the places of the empire, illustrations and text about the glorious empire (out of date by like. 2 years.) heavily read thru Finds a hidden compartment in the dresser Hold a stack of hidden letters Written in metaphor, shizuka has no idea Lot of poems and shit. 1 to be sent, the rest are recieved and saved Kavi talking to the mentor Seems that Hu Lelong and Sanmi Yuli missing “He probably went back to the capital city to his parents. He was sent here by his parents” “Hes talked about seeing someone, but i dont really want to know.” “Now that i think abt it, his parents had uhh. They had a hut for hunting, if hed be anywehre in town, he’d be there. There’s no way to go, but its probably he went north, past the old village expansion “He probably went that way, that’s where teh hut is.. Maybe theyre staying there for the night, thats where the old inn is too Has he been talking abt a trip “Nooo, because he stopped bringing that little book that he’d read all the time so I figured he kind of accepted his fate of being stuck here forever like the rest of us but hey maybe not” awesome. Katsu + Guiying informing the hunters about the kids Only one is the hunter w the broken leg
“Id really like to help, but uh. Everyones either out looking for Ugly Cute or theres 2 hunters that have lost their sense of direction, so they cant go.” When did that happen? “They came back in today bc it took them a while to get back home. Yeah, they ran into some kind of twig spirit that tried to kill them/attack them, after that they couldnt tell north from south.” They had some direction issues, where were they attacked?
“Headed up north? We’re having a lot of trouble finding Ugly Cute, we have soemone by the Spider Gate, but nothing” No signs? “No, we’ve come across, occasional looking footprints, but nothing recent. I mean, shit, i can- go out- or i can stay behind and tell ppl abt the children to search for them instead of Ugly Cute. i’m sure they’ll be fine, right? Maybe they just need to rest it off.” Summer 12 Twig spirit was probably a thatchling Disquiet dead pull together a bundle of grass and twigs so they can go about beating the shit out of people Start heading off towards old village expansion Not many buildings left, they could be removed to grow crops in the winter Further north is the mist wall Unlikely he travelled past here to get out of town They didn’t come up to the old village, seems like it wasn’t true, no hut to be found Able to recall an oddity headed up the path we came a few miles back
Up the Duyue River Some headed up north, teenager shaped Night falling, hunters hut Hut seems occupied Hear cries from the underbrush, “help me! Help! ah!“ not convincingly human tho Kill the thatchling Zhu hears the sound of a shutter being opened on the other side of the hut, a “shhh, quick, don’t make any noise!” Lelong is trying to get Sanmi out of the window “Ahhhh! Fancy seeing you out here. What brings you here?” Looking for you Youngsters running off when people are going missing and with the monsters about “People are going missing??? Grandma said everything was going fine.” Grandma lied “We tried to talk to them about it but they hates us” “Theyre gonna make Yuli marry a random man!” Matsuki’s grandkid
“Ive been asking ms Igawa Jubei to lend me books from her library, she lets me in and then i run to Luo and Laws” We talk to him a while and convince them to go back to town

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-7.htm.title: Session 7
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-7.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 6
Next Session: Session 8
Willowshore Summer 12 Level 4 Summer 13
We take the kids home Hu Lelong Sanmi Yuli
Quite the hubbub, Asahina Shinzo the merchant’s back in town “Hey i heard you guys were gonna go do a thing.” We buy some noppera-bo hoods from him
Asks us to bring some sushi to the Nine Ear Shrine
The headpriestess of the shrine is 13 years old Ba-Ming Ouh
Get to the Lumber Camp abt 4 in the afternoon “Hello there! We’re the camp owners! You should turn around and head back to town.” Do we have to do this everytime? Drop disguise to look Telepathic opening to the guards There’s a kappa, he’s being bullied (knocked all the water out of his head bowl) Mischievous creatures, pull pranks (took over the bathhouse during the attack on the town, have been stealing boats in town) Turtle-like humanoids Have to keep water in head bowl Many tales tell of tricking the kappa into bowing so the water spills, so it becomes lethargic and hurt it They’re not inherently hostile, sometimes befriend lonely children or help adventurers Many areas that have kappas have signs of warning of them being there and encouraging travelers to toss a cucumber into water if they want to cross over it Often the signs are put up by kappas themselves Manage to get the kappa out, he sneaks us some battle axes Dog is indifferent, accompanies us Cage fight between rats One guy sitting on a root burl, like the focus the prisoner described Loudly discussing what to do with the 4 prisoners there Whats the debate?
“Ahhhh welcome! Zhuo-do has decided these souls arent old enough, she’s given them to us as peace offering. But for peace offering she might mean to pass off undesirable trash.” Whyd she give to you
“Bc im the other leader?” Mujiro The common folk have disguised the age of their souls. One could be old and be an excellent negotiating chip for you “Whats the fun in letting her foul occults do the work for me?” Why are you here then “Im out of ideas! I guess i can just kill these 4 and march on the town?” Kill her and march on the town. Double the fun “You can kill her.” You dont have the confidence to deal with her? “Id like to stay alive. And i dont want to become tainted with their foul magics. We’re a simple group. We just want to hunt and enjoy the sport. Really we’d be happy to stay here i suppose. If someone were to get rid of the occultists and zu duo, they’d be able to leave the camp with these 4. And obv we’re not the ones doing the kidnapping so that’d stop.” If we kill her, whatd stop us from killing you? “What’s stopped you from… killing your way through the camp? Youdont want to kill mroe than necessary.” Are you going to invade willowshore? “If you go kill my nemesis and come back, i dont think we have what it takes.” We’re the vanguard for what its worth “Oh reassuring.” Just point us to her camp
“2 occultists in the building next door. 2 guarding an old man and talking about the other prisoner they’re bringing in tomorrow, he will… idk what they’ll do with him. Decide which is better for sacrificing. A bunch of hunting spiders next to that. Straight north is the ritual site, she’s taken a young boy there (Meng-sung), i dont think she’ll kill anytime soon. She’s evaluating the efficacy. She keeps one just in case the god shows up early.” Has it? “No, she contradicts herself every sentence.” He gives us keymaking tools “A token of my friendship. If theyre participating in kidnapping, tell them youre with the prayers. If theyre not, tell them youre with the rovers. That should keep you out of most trouble.” “4 occultists and 1 raving madwoman.” Why dont we take her out first? “I wont let you go unless you kill them and her.” Fog wall Its visible, the other one isnt until u walk in and get spit back out 200ft wall of ghostly screaming skulls, it extends several miles
Altar, shes chanting into the fog in the name of her deity 2 occultists are focused on chanting, they keep up a ritual all the time but they dont sacrifice someone unless they need to or its the full moon She doesnt turn around Deity we can’t identify, the wall we need to spend some time on She has a specialized dagger that seems nasty to get hit with Radiants fiendish energy Loving crafted, made of silver and motifs of strength and power Her body rips open, and the other cultists cough up butterflies From their bodies and from the fog, 4 creatures are going to take their place Mindless with wicker baskets full of red butterflies Something that is not common knowledge, something that requires a significant amount of study into any tomes or resources we can look into This isnt what Zoudou thought was going to happen, seems we may have to investigate and learn more. Perhaps over the course of the summer :) Capture one of the butterflies in Kavi’s hooded lantern Let the kid out “AAAAHHHH oh shit youre the bird.” “Did you guys rescue my dad?” Not yet! One of the rooms where the occultists are in has another altar, they’re praying to it Wooden knots, everytime you look it changes Hunched over man with broken arms Crouching frog thats choking on a man spider/octopus/plant combine As soon as you see it, it twists back 8ft tall that takes up a large portion of the room, take it out The other guy seems to be telling the truth about letting us go and leaving the city alone, but we can just like. Leave him alone for now we’ll just get stronger and he probably won’t Keeping an eye on him tho Return back to the village with 6 prisoners
Obvious proof that the old farmer is not who he says right now The guard arrests the ‘farmer’, put him in jail alongside the other one Greeted as heroes
Wrapped just in time to avoid the election fraud that Granny Hu was swearing was going to happen at the election on the 16th Next session wrapping up the summer

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-8.htm.title: Session 8
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-8.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 7
Next Session: Session 9
Willowshore Summer 13 Election is soon
As we’re settling down to rest, we’re approached surreptitiously by Kazuma Oono “Ik you’ve endorsed me for the election but i have news.”
“I must say, among other things, i think its known that my allegiances lie with northridge. That is sort of due to a series of favors owed to Granny Hu, but also this particular election, she’s let me know she has… some objects of mine she’s willing to destroy if im not dropping out of the mayoral election. Do you know what i could do in such a situation” Steal them? “I am not very stealthy! Is that such a good idea? I mean… ”Do u know where its located “I believe its in her home? That is my guess, but it would defeat the purpose of hiding smth from me if i knew where it was. I think its in her house, it would be- she has a storage shed from back when she was a guardswoman” I think i know someone to ask dont worry “It would be ghastly if it were in there, i dont think the elements would be good for the oils. The varnish.”
Go knock on the door of Hu Lelongs house
Place down in southside with his gf Sanmi Yuli “What brings you here?” We’re going to have a man talk “Whats a man talk?” So you like… women? “Yes????” Thats good! “You… like women?” Yyyyyes “Oh. cooooool….” And if you like someone youd do anything for them, even go into the woods during a ghost infestation? “Yyyyes?” And what if someones grandma had info on someone else’s grandparents that could hurt them? “Do i have to kill my grandmother….” NO WE’RE JUST STEALING FROM HER I just want to know where. Kill as few people as possible! “Youre trying to figure out where….” I need to know where the goods for various people might be held so that blackmail isnt held above your beloved family
“Theres a warehouse down at the Dock? She technically doesnt own it but she goes there… often?” “Weekly, maybe? IDK she grumbles sometimes, like ‘ill show them’ and she heads over there.” “She does have someone hired to uh. Keep an eye on things there tho. So watch out” Who is it? “I think she just hires retired guards.” Summer 14 Sending shizuka and guiying stealth + silence to sneak in Finds a strange bookcase that makes a secret door Plants Dangerous poisonous fungal plants that grow in dark environments, make good poisons If youre very careful also drugs Family documents, luo and laws degree is here, but also the large framed canvas paintings that are tasteful artistic images of a certain fox Shizuka knows its well done Signature is of a famous artist in the capital city that was artist in residence for the court Takes a tarp from another room, covers the painting Adventuring gear of higher quality than the guards Katsu kavi zhu are distracting via shapechanger We’re investigating shapechangers “I thought youn rounded them all up?” We rounded them all up in the camp
Awkward kavi’s dad Rajul Samudra is there w Zataku They distract them long enough for guiying and shizuka to escape with the goods Kavi’s dad notices the boat going down river and jumps in the water, surprisingly desperate to recover the boat Kavi calls out to him “Hey there Hey “Gotta run! Just another day at the job Yeah, you love working at the docks huh “Yeah! You should go anywhere else! Away from the docks! Good job getting employment elsewhere, not that the docks arent great Dad you need to talk about anything? “Nope! Kavi launches onto the boat “Hey kiddo, didnt know you could do that Yeah most ppl can run and jump “Yeah cool run and jump tho” (kicks a crate underneath the benches Dad what are you doing “Look adult problems can be very complicated, and i'm not trying to get into it. The thing is, that were both alive and thriving and we want it to stay that way, right? And if you get involved with me then you get involved with them
Them being Granny Hu? “Yeah the fucking crime organization?? Why are you doing this? Is she threatening you? Is she threatening me?
“Theyll send me back to jail for a long time. She has the paperwork ready to send me to the capital prison. She served on the queen’s guard for a number of years and i am a convicted terrorist” Really regetting some things huh “Yes, im going back on my beliefs and we both are out here and none of us are in prison Why would i be in prison? Is there something i dont know? “Look we can talk about later, but i dont want to talk about this on a boat where anyone can hear or read our lips and think that we’re conspiring. I dont want you to go to jail Ok sure, i’ll go to your place “Ok break in in the dead of night, i’ll leave the door unlocked Zhu tricks him into yelling parental affection to kavi
Back to Kazuma Oono, he is excited to have his paintings back Lot of jewelry and heirlooms in the boxes
Zhu offers to have the paintings in the Cerulean Teahouse, then display them properly 2-3 weeks after he becomes mayor Zhu: they’ll be safe in my room :) “They were done as part of a charity auction” I must be a sick orphan in the way i am getting charity Summer 15 Tentacle shark of granny hu’s stuff Katsu art things
Little Ugly Cute will dip leg in ink Draw a map Mark the quarry on it Draw a picture of the gate with the statue returned to it Are you saying we should make another one? Nodding Oh ok. Thanks buddy. I didnt know you could draw! Kavi visiting dad Someone is stationed watching their dad’s house (isnt the house kavi grew up in) Of the guards in this area, its conveniently in line of sight of them All 3 guards + 1 that you’d normally be able to see The guards shift out around 2am, kavi sneaks over at that time and believes themself to be hidden Dad is breathing and lying on the futon staring at the ceiling, its dark, looks like hes sleeping to anyone watching him Psst Dad “Ah you made it, hello How long have they been watching your place like this “Since they let me out of jail…well since i caved to their demands This whole time? “Yes, do you know why i went to jail? I was a kid man “Do you remember your mother at all? No “We had very strong convictions about flooding the town and ppls houses and putting everyone in danger, so we attempted to sabotage the dam with bombs Ok i see why youre saying you were labeled as a terrorist now “Uh yeah, your mother was considered the mastermind behind the plan and was sent immediately to capital prison and i remained here at the discretion of the caption of the guard at the time Granny hu?
“Yes..anyway the wizard in the tower claimed to be your guardian and that we were distant relatives. So you were not taken in by granny hu, but once it became clear that that was not the case, they were going to take action against you. I acquiesced and gave them the names of the other conspirators that sabotaged the Willowshore Dam and agreed to work for the old captain of the guard with anything she needs done Ok “Im sorry but its better that no one believes youre a potential bargaining chip Ill be honest, i didnt wanna know this “Thats why i didnt tell you, i love you so much, you are the most important thing in my life. Lets go back to pretending this never happened Ok..man.. And youre just okay being dragged around like this? “Well i have no way to confirm this, but shes written several letters regarding the execution of your mother So shes still alive? “Thats what granny hu says, i havent seen her since
“We have no reason to believe what she’s said but… We kind of have nothing else. Did you know if you are tried for treason in this country, they can arrest your entire family? :) Yeah! We tried to kill the governor! New evidence could pop up any day!” Yeah I uh,,, have sure heard that. What evidence would she have against you besides mom’s word? If she’s even said anything? “She has a great deal of influence and can… i assume she must have SOMETING because she got us put in jail in the first place and the guards were there, it was her testimony to the crown and she could change it if she wanted and they’d take it into account.” Ah. “I do not want anyone to think that because of who your parents are that there is something… wrong with you. That you’re a terrorist. And we didnt even succeed…Our family home is at the bottom of that lake.” Did you ever check it out again after everything happened? “No i figured that there was nothing left. I shouldve gotten the family shrine. We didnt think it was gonna flood when we left the house. Okay.. okay. “Well… Hang in there. Keep being a good, upstanding citizen and I will keep uh… being the father you do not like.” Thanks. “Stay away from that group if you could. I’d hate for her to find out anything about you.” I’ll be sure to do that. “Okay, good.. Good talk.” Summer 16
Successful election of kazuma oono Approached for a bounty of 50gp for anyone who can find the horrifying tentacle shark that attacked the town last night Kazuma oono is thinking of hanging one of the tasteful paintings where the other governors are Summer
Eyes of Fumeyoshi NOW The Fox’s Eyes
Nayeli = fox god = earth domain One is easy to get The other has a fox watching over it Unsure if its actually a fox or if its a spirit guardian Fox leaves no footprints Fur shifts between red brown and silver as it moves Type of fox that is native, it is considered a sacred animal Fading foxes Fox sushi! A second smaller fox scampers up from the pool, deposits it by our feet, scampers back to the woods With the power of sushi, we are able to pet the little foxes
We’re now legally the owners of the Cerulean Teahouse Needs to be repaired over the summer
Shrine in an abandoned house Abandoned Estates, the one shizuka stayed in, someone wants the shrine taken out to be worshipped again Kami living in it
Guiying’s mom You So-Jin thinks the expansion up north might have farmland for the winter, hopes to have us take people up there and spend time to fortify defenses so people can travel there and farm the land
Yun Mong-un wants to harvest sacred peach wood, only trusts Shizuka to do it
Igawa Jubei wants help w research from Kavi
+1 aid bonus from Hu Lelong Kappas show up again The one we saved Loudly ask for us, propose a deal If we give them cucumbers, theyll bring us more things
Zhu’s sister Yong Wu-Xiu gets in trouble with the guard in abt month 2 she’s supposed to help fix the teahouse, she doenst show up one day
shes in a loud shouting match in the middle of the street w zheng peng He’s insisting they need weapons and armor, the guards want to commandeer her labor and shop Horseshoes and fence posts arent glorious but ppl need things crafted so they eat in the winter Zhu: fight all you want but without food you’ll die. We could fight against each other and whoever wins can commission the blacksmith “Wait can yall help defend the town” For a fee “What kind of fee?”
What kind of protection does your Granny Hu charge my sister? “None, but point taken.” How much would she like to charge my sister? Earn income for working for the guards 1 level higher when doing it w the guards
Kazuma Oono asks if katsu wants to work with him on a manuscript Zhu is also there
