Guiying’s boss’s Mountain Summit Grass stuff has been overrun, he needs tea leaves, wants us to clear it out Summer downtime: Zhu repairing teahouse Takes 3 weeks Harvesting hope points Guiying recover old expansion 3 weeks fixing the farm 4 weeks, does not finish, gets ¾ done Kavi Succeeds at moving the shrine 1 week We put the shrine in the teahouse Research for the rest (kavi is cracked at research apparently) (you so-jin was there when willowshore founded, igawa can help, great willow can help, study zoudou’s notes Notes Curse borders north south east West is a visible barrier, easier barrier to remove, the walls of the monastery is beyond Would be good for info on willowshore Igawa notes Noppera-bo believe in paradise, but truth else
They worship Kugaptee but needs more research You so-jin
Kugapte is in the texts of the monastery, name of a fiend killed by Tan Sui-Jin
Perhaps the info is in the Tan Sugi Monastery] walls Katsu - Rocks and art - 4 weeks
- Paper spider Little Ugly Cute pokes at his backpack
- Ugly Cute’s Gift - Helping at the manuscript - 4 weeks, 3 successes Shizuka Infestation 3 weeks, finished just in time to gather tea and get started with teahouse Befriending the cat Cat lets her pat it, but still randomly standoffish Peach wood 3 weeks 4 free fulus of 5th level or less

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-9.htm.title: Session 9
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-9.htm.description:
Prev Session: Session 8
Next Session: Session 10
Willowshore More downtime First week of fall Digging thru the documents Katsu and shizuka fail Fixing the farm Done by guiying Research A lot of interpersonal drama, some info abt the tenets of the faith Aid townsfolk Zhu does it Things are going well in town but
Hello young boy. Sanmi Minhwan “Did you guy save the town?” Yeah
“I was in the forest, i was taking care of a fox, but yesterday i went to visit the fox and it left. When i went home, i dreamt of a white fox touching its nose to my head, i think its a message from Nayeli telling me i did a good job but IDK what to offer at her shrine” Zhu gives 10pieces of shrine sushi “Thank god someones offered a simple but tasty Inarizushi!”
Boy makes friends with the girl tending the shrine Ba-Ming Ouh Lots of foxes, seem excited to see us, our pockets get thoroughly sniffed Week 2 Aiding harvest Guiying Befriending cat Likes shizuka Spits up a jade cat talisman on her Research Kavi Nope Security Zhu Protector trees to replant trees More sorting Katsu critical Find 2 things, still some left to go thru 2 letters and a legal document One to beloved, one to guiyings mom Choose guiyings mom Yen rui “Please take care of the boy until i can return. They won’t be able to handle if he dies again so soon. Things are strange here, i only need a few more days.” Pretty old letter, 60 years old, from before granny hu got into town
Legal document is the will of Anjal of Thulsadus He had a will! He didnt just die, the will was missing
Splits Mother’s Coil 50/50 with kavi and Igawa Jubei! Can tell there was smth going on, he had reason to hide around his tower several caches of gold and items, which are mentioned in the will If anyone else tries to look behind the bookcase, they’ll get blasted Kavi and igawa can, they’re entitled to whatever they find there Igawa “He had a will? I know its news to me “I thought i was just really bad at detecting magic, this makes more sense. Alright we need to go do {insert convoluted stuff} to get in there” They feel like their abilities are being tested They each get their share: 320 gold pieces
Guiying visiting his mom You So-Jin “Ah its good to see you! Ok what brings u over? Dinner?”
Noo. so. I came across this letter, its addressed to you? (by Yen Rui) “Whered you get this….” Around… it was handed to me by a friend “It was taken from my… store along a number of things a while ago, i thought it was a robbery. Um. well, thank you for returning the letter to me?” Well. can i get any explanation abt the contents? Ive read it “.......so. it is- if one is to… successfully walk the path of enlightenment, its better not to know one’s previous paths.” How can i properly walk it if i dont even know my previous paths? “Live this life to the fullest with goodness and kindness, and then in your next life, you can remember this one with clarity and fondness.” I feel i have a right to know. I remember her. “Do… what exactly is it you remember?” I remember, she taught me writing.
“Yup. yep. When she was a librarian at the library. In the Tan Sugi Monastery.” Yes. “I will… perhaps. I will think on it because of what happened a few weeks ago, i dont want to tell you anything that might… cause you to begin a spiral downwards away from reincarnating to a more joyous place.” You dont trust me? That was a shapeshifter! I was right! “I…. you… i will think on specifically exactly what to tell you if it is your true sincere wish to know about the things youve done previously, i can teach you a meditation that can assist you in recalling, but you might not like what you find and it might make you worse. I think you should fortify yourself in this life, and perhaps the next you’ll be strong enough to handle it all” I want to learn it “It will take some time…” I have time. “We better get to it.” Cool encounter of the week
Nervous man clutching his ass Matsu “Im in a situation i need-” hits with heal “AH THANK GOD” What happened “I have a problem, i need heroes to help, i cant say more.” “There are giant vipers in my outhouse, they bit me on the ass.” Why are they there????? “IDK… probably some evil! Could be the same as the evil centipedes!” 2 gold each and an invitation to dinner to get rid of snakes Kavi does a sexy dance, charming the snakes and getting them out of the outhouse As the days go on, there are significantly less snakes, watch the frog swallow 2 whole, the cat has killed several Feels like the cat is laughing but weird cat Nice dinner “Ive kept the treasure locked up, my pa was a renowned demon hunter. If youll take this, id be honored, IDK if youll find anything but here” Week 3
- Kazuma Oono thinks we should celebrate the first long night - Wants it to be a big celebration - (kavi and guiying get a +1 for any contests for crit succeeds) - Festival - 3 traditional celebrations - Cant play more than once - Admiring the moon - Bundle cutting - Lantern making
- Asahina Shinzo is here - Not participating, sitting off in a corner while everyone enjoys themselves - Zhu: i think we’re at the bottom, if i win this festival we’ll be somuch closer to solving the crisis - “IDK if thats true zhu. You can do it tho!” - Do u want to take place in the festivals - “No im happy to just watch.“ - One of those - “Yeah an artist. Who observes.” - Surely theres one you want to participate in - “No im ok” - “Ive gotta attend my stall” - Its human to want to participate in some way - Kazuma: “COME ADMIRE THE MOON WITH MEEE” - Btw the cat likes to dance - Bundle Cutting - Shizuka won - Lantern Cutting - We failed - Admiring the moon - Zhu did so good at being gay - Zhu’s sister comes from the north, which is a little strange - You So-Jin offers stuff at a shrine revolving around reincarnation but not for a specific deity, gui goes with her Week 4 Research great willow Research reincarnation The most likely source of curse seems to be By researching the methods the noppera-bo were doing, u can go past the skull wall Guiying learning meditation Oof. Aid hunting no Last letter Sort of written in code Able to recognize it as some kind of code ppl from the same org would talk to each other with “Dearly Beloved, im sorry im too much of a coward to tell you in person, i had to write it as a letter. I have a wife and family, and she is returning to town after her long journey. I will be letting her know i found someone else to occupy my heart. Im sorry for deceiving you. Even if you no longer wish to speak to me, i will still leave her, it is certain you are the only one for me. -2nd”
Wasnt delivered bc Granny Hu got it Event
Elizeth Candora has come to visit El: i meet frequently with guiying, i think we’re friends El: kavi and katsu can i talk to you? Whats up? “Hi ZHu, and elderly villager died of the flu the previous night and the corpse is gone I see you arent doing your job again “I believe it is You So-Jin, she animated the body. We arent on good terms. If you handle it i can pay you money Why do you think its you so-jin “Shes the closest person, she hangs in the graveyard at night,a nd she performs strange rituals Zhu is upset that she didnt do anything ti help him “I will pray for your soul We’ll look into it Go look for the corpse Track the footsteps out of the graveyard and to the teahouse Go around the back, find a zombie crouched deep in our shrubbery
HI THE CAT? Yami YOU TALK???? “Yeah” Does the dog talk too??? “No thats a normal dog” “Please let me keep my zombie” “She used to give me food, she dances so pretty in the moonlight, see now she doesnt have to worry about arthritis” Are you familiar with the concept of slavery? What are you? “Oh. nyah.” Why can you talk “Im just that good” Why did you act like a normal cat for several weeks????? “Haha yeah.” Can you stop raising dead ur implicating my mom “Why would she be implicated” She tends the graveyard “Oh lol” Bakeneko when cats lives are extended past normal Feline becomes more and more monstrous, eventually itll be able to walk up right and learn languages Promise to give sushi and have a dance party every night and morning - “Oh yay. I can even help you with rituals. I can count as a secondary caster.” - Why would u think my mom would do smth like raise the dead - “Im glad it wasnt the case.” - Zhu is pissed abt the cycle of life and death being disrupted and is taking drugs - This is a very powerful cat when it was a normal cat before, but also when bakenekos die they immediately reincarnate into a normal cat - We feed the cat dreamtime tea sushi, kill it - It stops smoking and glowing
- Cat with Kimchi colored kittens + 1 with markings like Kami dumps litter at the teahouse Week 5 Meditation Good work Hunting crit Research Can now bring down the wall of ghosts Think everything left to learn is done Zhu is busting peoples kneecaps for drugs Actually getting blackmail Katsu trying to get the party to be friends 2 questions for each player Favorite color for each of us? Everyone gets a nice scarf in their fave color Zhu’s fave color is red Guiyings favorite color is black If you were going to have a role in a theatrical production for no particular reason what so ever, what role would you like the most?

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-10.ht.title: Session 10
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-10.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 9
Next Session: Session 11
Willowshore
Igawa Jubei is about kavi’s age, offers to be a secondary caster on the ritual, also would offer to bring her apprentice Hu Lelong along but hes gone off with some of the guards to investigate the thatchlings that attacked him now that he has learned one (1) cantrip Theyre off doing that rn
Kazuma oono also comes to help us cast the ritual
Zhu’s sister Yong Wu-Xiu asks if she can borrow our weapons for a few days before we go Z: you can borrow kavi’s, the others can offer at their leisure
Yun Mong-un reminds her to take the talismans
Katsu’s dad Kawaka Myna ingredients for the ritual and 60 gold
Matsuki gives us food and wine 6 days of rations and 5 bottles of medicinal wine
Guiyings mom You So-Jin warning him abt stuff “Theres all sorts of rumors of ghosts and undead” “Path should be straightforward, takes 3 days, at least last i came to visit. Shrine on the bridge, youre supposed to sleep there and reflect on your reincarnations. There’s a garden shrine, burning incense in the garden, straightforward. Mountain shrine on a bridge. Pulleys that you can pull yourself in, its about the crossing to symbolize life and death, maybe itll be overgrown, but if its like the centipedes, that could be dangerous.” “You could use sealing fulus on the gate” “Its a unique situation that i could suppose its possible, my sincere hope is that you dont run into anyone who knew you. Its been a long time.” Gives us 2 level appropriate elixirs of life Kavi takes Oono to the side It might be a good idea to be particularly kind to Zhu at the moment if you stick with us, he doesnt like us “Whatd you do?” Didnt immediately kill a bakeneko, its a long story “What in town??” Its a long story, its been dealt with “Oh well thats a relief” Kavi asks him to be particularly kind “Yes I was planning on that anyway and also I can only stay for the ritual” Going to the wall to do a ritual Crit success A tunnel open in the wall of ghosts, roughly 10ft in radius, allows us to see an overgrown road that leads into the foggy forest and beyond Late afternoon w heavy fog, anything more than 60ft away is concealed Trees seem smaller than what we remember, feel like we’re being watched, no animal calls no soft breeze, just still mist
Identify that this forest is way younger than its supposed to be. Abt 1k years back than normal. Monks arent even here yet, the Pilgrim's Path has just been created Come across a small clearing with a woman’s body Wearing monk robes, teal sash Trail of blood leads to the north Gaping gorey hole in the center of her chest, fog curls out of it, occasionally see the twisted face of a screaming spirit as it ascends into the sky Words carved into the stone under her body, though its not possible to see them from the side Guiying feels a strong aversion to looking at the corpse
Zhu and katsu know from context that this must be the legendary heroine who defeated the fiend (Tan Sui-Jin) where the Tan Sugi Monastery now stands Age of the body is contradictory, shes not rotting. Preserved but also from the blood and such she’s been here for a long time (like 2ish weeks) More of a display than a crime scene Zhu hears “find the seed.” after he tries to disbelieve Someone has changed the fundamentals of reality to display her this way. “Find the seed, A-ying.” Zhu tries to read the runes
“Kugaptee’s Victory.” Echo of lost moments offers to switch in He can see tiny bits of golden spirit bound in this construct It doesnt have much left, but there appears to be something ‘trapped’ in there Echo of lost moments manifests for a second for all of us (see a monk with prayer beads that bows in front of the body that then points to the north) Roots turned into hands that clutch at each of the pieces, hold them in place, could even be using this spirit to sustain the (smth) “My heart. Find the seed to replant the sugi tree” Vulture pecking at a human heart with golden threads, 3 cacodaemons begging for scraps Kill it, butterflies crawling out Guiying grabs the heart, Kugaptee’s anger roars, the forest begins changing Guiying puts the heart in after the thingy Foggy tunnel can be traversed with ease for the rest of the campaign Zhu the thingy manifests again For the duration of this section, if he does echo of lost memory, spell or attack adds 1 spirit damage with the holy tag 30 mins down the road run into another kappa Cries out in fear at seeing us, apologizes for getting in our way Hearing enemy like sounds
“Ive made enemies of the Storm Mother, idk why shes tormenting me but she is :(“ “It seems like its been forever, could you come with me to the could.” She keeps threatening to pick him up and dropping him off the edge of the world and making him walk home He tries to tour guide us around It always takes a day to traverse the path no matter how fast you are 2 2-headed snakes want to attack the kappa right before it reaches home Highest: reflex Lowest: will Special abilities: critical hit by spit strike ur blind (also has venom), also very good vision None weakness, immune to petrify We save him, he gives us some things from the bottom of the lake “The storm mother, is like 3 of me stacked on top of each other, brown hairs, she carries a staff, rides on a broomstick, she flies me on the other end of the world and drops me there.” Whys she doing that “IDK, she talks about my weakness and that im pathetic. WAIT she has a weakness, she HATES the smell of incense, it makes her throw up!”

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-11.ht.title: Session 11
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-11.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 10
Next Session: Session 12
Pilgrim's Path Bridge with the shrine Roof provides shelter from the elements Long handled dippers that bing up river water for drinking w clay vials Wicker mats that let u sleep above the river Ominous aura Ghosts in the water, surrounding the shrine Zhu blasts with heal Arms of the drowned begin to shake the bridge Water fills with leeches Deal with it Shrine has a different energy now that weve purified it Zhu looking at guiyings blood Kinda coagulated, doesnt flow that much Very pale, glowing red eyes Manipulates ki Nap River dippers have been refilled, we feel ready to continue the path forward Guiying feels nostalgic Its raining today Confront guiying about the undead thing but he walks faster ahead of us Hear the sound of slurping as 2 strange moving plants, soil is red beneath them, block the path ahead Slurp up liquid from the ground, mutter praises to the demon and block our path They can drain blood, regain hp from it and drain u Will is lowest save The mandragoras split apart, revealing crystalized blood in their cores Guiying says a secret to zhu: has always wanted to dance Travel for a few hours Hear sobbing coming from a large hollow at the base of a tree up ahead Young woman huddled in the tree’s base Hello?
“Ive lost my sister… we’ve gotten separated! Would you… would you please help me find her?” Shes clutching beads tightly How long has she been missing? “IDK seems like ive been hiding for maybe a day, i had a nightmare about being chased by a head. I woke up without my sister.” Head of a human? “Yeah! It was awful, terrible nightmare.” “We were planning on going to the monastery, she should be up ahead.” Zhu’s shapechanger intuition goes off What manner of ghost are you “Im no ghost!” Do recall she left town 10 years ago The woman youre impersonating left town 10 years ago “I left town yesterday, im not impersonating town!” Theyre abt zhu’s age, roughly zhu’s generation (young 30s) “Please just help me find my sister!” No I want to trust and help but zhu hasnt been wrong about this stuff before “AAAA STOP SAYING THESE TERRIBLE THINGS, I JUST WANT TO FIND MY SISTER AND GO HOME”
Why not head towards the Tan Sugi Monastery? “OKAY. lets go together!” Zhu: no She seems genuinely distressed + confused Kavi notes that the hollow tree has a strong preservative force. Theres a small seam on her neck Creature that preserves itself in vats of vinegar Shes a flying head creature, penanggalan Fight her “Please find my sister and save her too!” Leaves behind her holy beads Downpour The once beautiful gardens have been partially burned, ash strewn about 3 sets of unlit lanterns Small shrine in the back Burned relatively recently Ominous vibe 4 combusted in the building pretending to be monks They dont like incense and rain Move the straw roofing, but the rain comes in drenching them Bury them Light incense in the lanterns Peace falls over us, half dozen blue orchids bloom around the oak tree 6 blooms of particular note Associated with healing Being offered up to us by a benevolent spirit in the area

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-12.ht.title: Session 12
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-12.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 11
Next Session: Session 13 Long rest Weather is even worse this morning
Continuing on Pilgrim's Path We go up treacherous mountain path, still supernaturally slowed
Come across a figure standing beside a Torii gate Xin Yue “Dont worry im not one of your spirits, i’ll fix this. Im merely temporarily stuck in this manner.” Robes “I am many things but not a liar.” What are you “Monk, acolyte, priestess i suppose.” Of what?
“Oh! Kugaptee. I came to chat before we fought. Your blood will soak the tree. Did you like the mandrakes? They’re a nice thematic touch.” Thematic how??? “Plant that eats blood, plant that eats blood.” “Hows the reading coming along shizuka?” Not awesome? How should we refer to you? “High priestess. The love of my life is dedicated to letting you figure things out. She’s dedicated.” We’re stuck in a cycle of life and death we’re aware “If you want to make a deal with the ghosts theres a nice tree for you. Im happy to eat them.” You mentioned wanting to kill us?
“That should be tomorrow, how you deal with the puzzles, freeing her soul.” Whos? “Love of my life, very admirable.” Does she have a name? What is it? “She sure does A-ying.” So shes a fey? We cant know her name? “I mean, if you really want… well no, i should still have a shred of loyalty, let her do her whole guardian spirit thing.” Is she the goddess that put us in this? Thanks for letting us know its a goddess “There are many forces at play, we’re all together in this… with our lord. Our fiendish master. Not all of us have accepted out fate. I have plenty of time to bring her over.” What if she never does “There’s only so long someone can hold out.” How long has it been already? “Since the tree was planted. Shed been in there… a thousand years, at least a hundred since collecting… hundred 60. Big monastery with a lot of dead monks and woodcutter.” Dont understand what sort of game youre getting at. Seems like youve seen us before? “Ive never seen you make it this far before, never get past the wall. I may not have to chant my way out.” “It takes a long time to do, depends on whether your fresh blood is enough to awaken him or not” “I guess some of you dont have fresh blood.” Do you? “No.” Then i dont want to hear you talk “I need the blood to be reborn in a real body than be in this decrepit awful thing.” She seems unconcerned She could hear the message “The thing is, im not even here. Again i really hoped you enjoyed the creatures along the path” Are you going to say something interesting? “I can leave I suppose” Zhu throws ignition at the illusion It doesnt go through, but see her make a blasphemous sign “That was… didnt mean to do that.” You can counteract divine magic? “Maybe so. There is one true divinity. Its not whatever you follow.” She is dispelled by the spell, but she can come back Kavi guiying zhu feel unwell as we begin to recall our own past deaths. Not necessarily from this body. Especially guiying. Her face seems like 3 different ones, he sees 3 distinct familiar but unplaceable. Except one. That is one he got visions of during the week of meditations Zhu gets throwing himself in the river but being dragged out by the ghosts Kavi has recollection of loving families and dying surrounded by grandchildren, farming the land, studying in a library with oldman hands scratching against paper as they write their theories down, deaths are unfulfilling, wanted more, none are as violent as what guiying and zhu are experiencing. Shizuka has very few human memories, paws and wings, other such forms. Seems when she reincarnates that she has enough karmic debt to be knocked back down into a non-speaking sentient form. As though some curse prevents her from understanding/achieving the next step of enlightenment. G: i know you.. “Yeah :)” Ive seen you a lot “Is that as far as youve gotten? I forgot how shit of a monk you are.” How many lives have i met you…? “Well. three important ones.” (guiying feels heartache wrt her) Have i.. Hurt you in the past? “Oh what a question. Not in any way that matters.” Wdym? “You are an insignificant footnote in my grand history. A rebound if you will.” Were we… lovers? “[laughs] ohhh. In a life. What a mistake. Well grief blinds you to all sorts of things.” What about the other 2? “The other 2?” What were you to me? “Ohh. i suppose a friend for one. A mentor, i guess, for the other.” What did we start as? “Travelling companions. When we were both intact of soul, in not these awful bodies.” What did we end as? Zhu: dead. What does it matter? “Well said. And we will die again. And you will only get worse.” Z: i do have a theory. Hundredth’s time the charm. Lets take care of this. She worships a creature, Kugapte, that’s unbound from life and death Storm continues to rage on Pulley system of destiny Raft, one must pull the raft along Guiying spots a figure on the other side
Pulley gets destroyed by the Storm Mother We fight her She dissipates into blood butterflies Hello glowing box Full of good artifacts for us! Zhu does the tea rites at the shrine Rest
We go to the Tan Sugi Monastery

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-13.ht.title: Session 13
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-13.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 12
Next Session: Session 14
Tan Sugi Monastery Spirit cowering half inside a pillar
Yuni Ghost commoner Appears to have been attacked by a feline creature Appears to be a typical site bound ghost of a young woman, early 20s late teens She’s kinda glanced at us, not very interested, not totally aware of where her body is in relation to the pillar Zhu: what are we hiding from? “AH. um. Uh. where did you get those… we’re hiding from the creature that eats. Where did you get those beads?” Down the way, why? They were sold to me by a merchant “No, they were my sister’s… is she okay?” I didnt see any signs of struggle, may have been a common thief “Where is she??” She mightve gone to town “No we were going this way!” Maybe she went to get help, there was a beast “Oh, i suppose that makes sense, ill keep waiting for her” We’ll find her (message to us: we’ll have to kill this one on the way out) What does the beast eat? “It eats doors? And corpses?” (kavi thinking ghoul? But wait its wood, maybe its related to woodcutters that came here? Creatures dont normally eat doors. Sense in their heart that this thing is pretty nasty. Would be- would not want to fight it straight on.) Ear to the door Conversation happening on the other side They are generally profaning jian’soo, laughing, discussing the futility of jian’soo’s presence in the multiverse, the pointlessness of life after death
Open the door, statue of Lady Jansoo tied up Shizuka: whys the statue tied up “Are you stupid?” Yeah “Jian’soo, life after death, take care of death, stupid bitch, we tie up her statue to represent futility for better next left. Rope contain. Rope symbolic.” g: if you dont believe in working for a better life, dont? [...] “Ah another fallen monk. Your compatriots are next door. Monk never pass on. Monk stuck here forever. Go to the next room “Heeeeelp. Please. We cant stop bleeding. Heeeelp. If only we had a doctor.” This place is an infirmary, dont think they can actually be healed, but going through the motion might convince them they’re well again Zhu agrees to heal them in exchange for zerk “Oh thank you doctor, ive been bleeding since the attack on the monastery” The attack? “Yes… we slaughtered each other. My brother and i crawled to the doctor, but he laid dead. We returned in this grotesque form.” Returned? So you didnt just stay here? What caused the attack? “Let me think more on it, let me concentrate on my pain and anguish.”\ As the bodies disintegrate, their bodies will rise Echoes of lost moments will manifest, extend his ghostly hand toward them, absorb them into himself Giant undead kitsune tried to attack us through pillars Gnaws and screams and growls, swipes at us Hear the rustling of pages beyond the door “Do you remember what was here?” (Religious tomes and tablets, these creatures have been slowly sifting through, but as they sift through they forget where they started) Religious tomes “Yes… there were the tomes. The tomes were here. Nothing else here? You dont remember the important thing that was here?” Huh? “If you dont remember, how would we remember?” There are many important things here, you have to be more specific “Why dont you come all the way in? I hear growling outside.” (One keeps insisting we tell what’s here) “Once we’ve found the thing we’re here to find, we should burn it.” Guiying notices an odd back wall We find warding tablets “Ah you found it! How impressive!” Isnt it what you came here for? Should you not leave? “We recall some things. We remember. We shall not hurt you until we forget what youve done here for us.” Whatd you remember? “The tablets! They were here, here in the fire?” Why are they important? “I dont remember that. Theyre very expensive. We were looking for hidden tablet, hidden book of spells, surely this is it, and now that its in the hands of a corrupted monk, its good, not in the hands of anyone else.” Go into a secret room Hi ghostly “Who intrudes?” Guiying “Guiying?? Oh! Well. um. Alright. Stand down my poltergeists. I didnt anticipate someone coming here until the seals were lifted. Welcome to myyy library.” Whoa re you?
“Yen Rui!” G: i remember you. Introduce us?
G: one of my mentors when i was younger. She taught me how to write. You also sent my mother a letter?
“Yes. yup. I sure did.. Um. i suppose i didnt make it down out of the monastery. What are you still doing in town?” Ive been training. Staying with my mother. “Oh. huh. Interesting….” We’re trying to solve the problem with the monastery. We cant get out of town rn “Right. Um. im glad to see you, but i hoped you were long gone.” K: why?
“Well. my plan was um. I mean. So-jin and i were going to take you and go somewhere far away. I told her that if i didnt make it, shed leave. Im surprised she didnt do it. And stayed near the fiend tree. With the fiend influenced boy. Not that im not happy to have your help of course, but…” “So many people here, 20 of you-” Zhu: Most of them are duplicates, dont look at them, just me “I see. Im sure you know theyre trying to talk to you.” Zhu: they mostly just scream “That would be my friend. Um. it seems my friend, they may only speak to you when you’re close to their domain, which doesnt help with working together.” The tentacle shark gets rowdy Wheres the alcohol? “I expect there to be some in the kitchen if a creature hasnt over taken it.” G: can you tell us more about the fiend tree?
“Well. a thousand years ago. Tan Sui-Jin gave her life in a fight with a powerful fiend, she had many allies by her, and they were not successful in their attempts to permanently kill the fiend. They… she passed away fighting the fiend. She turned herself into a tree, under which the fiend is buried. Recently something has changed since- at the start of the summer, the grave was cracked open, reanimating the monks, though im privy to history i cannot leave, only listen at the walls, that is what ive gathered. If you have any questions about what happened before my death, im happy to answer.” G: Tell a bit more about me? I read the letter you sent my mother. I know something happened, but i cant remember everything. Confusing “It might be best that way.” G: Thats what my mother said too. I dont understand. “Its pretty straightforward. Just live a normal life. And then, in your next life, start thinking back on the horrors. You dont have to risk it and keep spiraling. You can stop here.” G: im already far beyond a normal life, i’d say. “So? You assume youre in karmic debt from the nature of your creation, i dont think its accurate.” G: what do you think? “I think you can life a normal, happy life in the confines in the cycle of reincarnation.” G: i plan to have a happy l;ife, id like to understand the past. I already ran into someone who knew me “Ill help you to free the town, but after you should leave, you’ll keep running into them. They’ll keep making you worse.” G: how will they make me worse? “You can pause on your path to enlightenment for one life instead of sinking lower.” Z: we paused for a hundred lives “Its still the same one!” “Wait. how do you know that?” Z: hints
G: explains the situation abt Xin Yue “Oh yikes. Her other half is gonna be mad about that. I cant actually purify the shrine myself. But if you did and returned it to its spot in the garden, you can talk to the founder of the monastery who is stuck in the tree. By restoring the shrines you can speak to her briefly. She’s going to be mad you were give too many hints. I suppose. Not that shes trying to keep you in the dark. It seems an awfully difficult thing to come to grips with.” G: we just want to help the monastery “For sure.” Z: we’ve died a hundred times, nothing has changed, why not try something new? “I’ll give you my notes… i just dont think we need to get into guiying’s rap sheet.” “Have you noticed that we’re all dead? Have you thought who could be responsible? Its her. Shes an awful bitch. Think in your heart if you want her to make you worse.” K: has this happened multiple times? “YES.” G: how can i make amends for a life i cant remember? “BY BECOMING A FARMER. I will. Tell you somethings. I would like you to purify the statue.” Z: you’re old. Presumably. “Yes.” Z: the people have town have forgotten. What gods have been forgotten? “The fiend.” Z: but the fiend isnt the one that did this im sure. If he did, his presence would be in town, wouldnt ahev to send envoys. “Damn it. If i wasnt stuck in this room. I think, and again this is before we were resurrected, whoever fucked around with the tree and let the fiend rise as a god, the 3 who were in the tree at the time would remember, i think my lingering ghost heard a ritual occurring but…”
“Theres a door that leads to a garden, that leads to stairs, down which leads to the base of the tree. I wouldnt recommend going down there til you have gotten the aid of zhi hui. But if you’re confident…” “if - whichever is the most responsible before giving to guiying, thatd be great.” Long ass journel entry, but she makes it nagaji so guiying cant read it, diary of her past lives “I… do not judge me for what ive done in my past. Ive atoned for each day. More than a handful will know the shame. Do you have any questions about the monastery? You can also rest here.” Z: do you have an armory? “Noo storage room. There was a nice shield hung up on the walls near the shrine recreating the tree?” G: if we’re able to purify the shrine, will you be able to move to your next life? “Once the danger is gone, ill be able to move on.” G: you deserve a good life. A happy one. “Ill take a rain check, and when you recall yourself, you can say it again if you believe it.” G: um. Uh. do you know where zhi hui is? “Well. aforementioned shrines. She’s found within the tree. But restoring the shrines will give her the power to manifest again. The entire monastery is her domain?” “Theres one right here, youd have to bring it back to the garden. Theres a recreation of the tree, a statue of jian’soo, and a statue of a deer. Itd probably take 10 mins of prayer to purify the statues?” Uhhh so the statues head “Reattaching should be fine? Then purify?” Go through the garden “Hello there!” Oh god wtf is that A fiend of glutteny. A nindoru, fiends that are separate from reincarnation. Can manifest objects from thoughts “Welcome to my dormitory!” “Are you in search of a shrine? A statue?” Yes “The deer?” Its one we’d bargain for “My stomach is empty, ive been filling it with the stone, id be willing to regurgitate it for you. Maybe a pound or two of your flesh? Just an arm.” “Im quite enjoying having this artifact in my stomach, but i miss human flesh more. I dont want to fight if you’re willing to trade. Just a hand or foot.” Theres a beast out there? “Its not living!” Ok combat Ok we get the deer statue Put it back to the pedestal 10 mins Zhi hui “Excellent, thank you, i… appear before you… very weakened…. Thank you, its been so long since ive been able to see beyond the tree. I can remain long enough to answer 1 question of me, there are other statues.” Z: what happened to the tree? Who are the other people?
“Trapped with me are Tan Sui-Jin, Xin Yue, the fiend kugapte. As for waht happened, the governor, your governor, he thought to bolster the tree. His attempt, it backfired, and cracked open the grave, plunging us all into a mindscape. I… cannot see how many years we’vve repeated the cycle, but i know something has changed outside. Either his strength has grown, or there are outside forces. We may not get another chance. This may be the last one.”

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-14.ht.title: Session 14
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-14.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 13
Next Session: Session 15
Tan Sugi Monastery Go back around “Ohhhh what have you found” Why do u think we’ve found smth We go around Set off a trap Soup is corrupted Flesh creature probably wanted our flesh to add to this pot Culturally important items for the monks, someone went out of their way to hide these under the floorboards Undamaged 3 creatures that want snacks and tea Successfully do the tea ceremony “Before we pass on, each of us might answer one question for thee if you wish.” Do you remember what happened right before? Strange or odd? “Yes we slaughtered each other at the foot of the great fiend tree!”
“The once strong Xin Yue slit her throat in service to the fiend and was reborn again! And so we devoured each other in the name of Kugaptee.” How does this show the pointlessness of life and death? “Well. we have worked our whole lives to recall our past memories and be reborn in living bodies with memories of who we’ve been. In such a case, xin yue was reborn immediately into a new body. If our tenants hold true, their soul shouldve been toward the sea of souls and returned, karmic debt, but instead they came to their own body, more powerful. The whispers in my dreams confirm.” Do you know what led her down this path? Why she decided to serve the fiend?
“Well. long ago. Xin yue and Zhi hui had a history together, many things, many past lives journeying, quite a long history of which i know not all. But after the monastery was founded, zhi hui lived to an old age and passed away, xin yue discovered that their soul didnt return back to Lady Jansoo, it had become sealed within the tree. To communicate their love, they had to to communicate with the tree. As soon as zhi hui accepts that kugaptee is correct, they will be reborn in a new body. But until then, their soul shall be trapped within the tree alongside Tan Sui-Jin.” Pedestal Some kind of fox was on it Zhu recalls that it would fit the statue the librarian tried to get us to take Dead tree Shrine that just needs to be purified 10 mins Creature howls in agony Try to grab the statue head, big plan Tree comes to life, trying to frighten and panic guiying Double nat 1 wow Go grab that fox statue We get 2 questions for this We were wondering about kugapte, how he formed? That is an interesting question. I hate to it, but we dont fully know. I can tell you how the first- what he is? What type of demon, and how the first one was formed, but the specifics of him and an xui jin’s rivalry are unknown. If that would give you something to work with. Yes pls Hes a type of fiend called a nindoru, they form the corruption of the cycle of reincarnation. When a mortal is taken from the cycle of reincarnation and corrupted, it becomes a nindoru. Break cycles, hide their true faces, they look and act undead though they are alive. Each is a type of cycle from a natural world or social tradition and most importantly, they eat the souls of those who have reincarnated multiple times. But they don’t take the whole soul. They take pieces of you away, especially those who are about to ascent to true enlightenment, they shred the soul and send you back to the sea of enlightenment, but you are no longer complete. They’re the greatest threat, most abhorrent, its possible when your soul is shredded, you could be so incomplete that you reincarnate into one of these creatures.
Before the war that ate the gods, when ascending/losing deific status was easy, these fiends amassed and lost followers quite swiftly. The first nindoru fiend, it is said, was a human child born to samsaran parents. They felt it would be best for the child to live among humans to recall and learn and go thru the process as one should, but as he learned of his true heritage, instead of feeling grateful to be raised among humans he felt rejected, upset. They hoped that he would live harmoniously and reincarnate back into a samsaran in his next life, but he became angry and resentful. His name was Sigek.
Became bitter against all those that were reincarnated, demanded to know why life was only achievable thru and arbitrary karmic cycle, became obsessed with achieving perfection beyond the cycle of life and death, worked for a lich, the lich tells him about a soul cage that helps him achieve this. He couldnt accept vulnerability so he turned on his master and kept him in the soul cage. He travelled and spoke to others of likemind, around the time of the slaughter in the heavens in which lord Jiyong was executed at the behest of judge Lady Yaojun and so became obsessed with undeath and reincarnation. After many years his sizeable congregation perhaps with the backing of lord jiong, he created a ritual written in his records that would shatter the wheel and free us all from the cycle of life and death. After that no one saw him or his cult, they went in to perform the ritual and didnt emerge. Later that year, the 1st of nindoru fiends appeared, and around this time the most powerful of them appeared, sigek and kugapte. Its unknown their relationship, is sigek took his name or took his soul. They claimed the ritual was a gateway that always existed. Its possible in the age of gods that the cycle really did get broken
(oh god cliffnotes from Elizeth Candora. Part of this is taken from pathfinder lore, touchstones. 3 judges, theres a Court of Silence, known to many a scholar, during the war in which the gods were eaten, they realized this creature, something before the gods was lost to time, bc they were very involved, they were messing shit around, throwing divine energy out at an irresponsible level. Someone, angry, created a creature that fed off this energy. The more they got involved, the bigger it got, until it could eat planets. They had to call in the non-divine extraplanars to get assistance (no devils, demons, angels, axiomites, etc) like the elementals perhaps. Whole thing, they fought, theological importance. They got pretty far. To slow him down, in the middle of the godeater war, the gods (100s to thousands) retreated back to the outer planes. They formed a council of deities that could minorly influence the mortal realm. The 30 on A’s pinterest are the ones that known to exist, at least said they were here. Kind of a. Symbol of death = someone has complete influence over that domain. Some deities have a domain, some have multiple. Dragon lady head of the pantheon, golden, had a husband. Husband had a twin brother, the night killed the moon to get the sun, she ordered the execution of the night (jiyong) they came back from the dead, they represent reincarnation. Jiyong represents undeath) Ok not a major god, most likely a local god or someone who had a taste of divinity What could be helping him get this sort of power? Well. there are a number of ways that he could be helped, but the first is that he is in combat with tan zui jin and he’s asleep (unlikely). To my understanding, the things youve seen outside of the monastery comes from unconscious recollections We did see his butterflies Hm. but did you see anything such as the tree in this yard. People we cant remember He certainly has an influence over the entirety of this area. We have encountered those worshipping him
There is likely, on the otherside of this trapped base, he has a very powerful quajin. Xin yue, they create rituals to bolster him. At some point, a man with spiritual ownership of the town conducted a ritual- (the Governor) it seems as tho in doing this and putting the down on the line, thought he was going to exorcise the demon and get more influence, may have put the town spiritually in the ownership of this demon, which is a very powerful thing for a demon to have. There is also in some ways, your own spirits unintentionally feeding the continuation of this terrible nightmare Wdym? Because weve been thru so many cycles? Yes and the moment it continues, your governor sought to bolster the tree and instead cracked the grave of the fiend. He grows in strength, various people have come here to stop him. He had less influence at the start Does he just keep doing this cycle? Yes, xin yue has been cycling and chanting and without his followers sensing his presence have returned to bolster him. If only there was a way to revoke ownership from the governor
We need to go outside to the capital and get one of us to become the governor If you can find some way to make yourself interact with the outside world, that would certainly help things considerably. The governor also has brought himself into his own separate mindscape, not on purpose, along with his house. It might be there where you can find him to ask him questions about how he learned this ritual/magic We go fight sojiruhs Cleanse the statue Whoaaaa the monastery is restored Water is pure, no longer any scary reflections “I may now manifest anywhere in the monastery, if you are in need of any healing or spells, i can do that for you.” Go to the basement Murder basement Sacrificed prisoners Treasury, normally symbolically empty but its not
On the wall is the shape of a great Tan Sugi Tree Go down the hallway Room of blood Pool with 4 fingers and a thumb “Good you finally arrived to exchange your flesh and blood to kugapte, but you should be honored to be chosen for such a role. Of course, i shall be the blade that severs you from the cycle of life and death.” What makes you think we’ll be an easy fight? I dont care which one of us dies. I’ll think about killing myself but I want to kill one of you first Why do you think working for the demon that your lover killed would bring her back? “My lover didnt, my lover died in that fight. Guiying and i sucked ass and ate shit.” You fuck up once and make it better “Are you doing that?” Yeah “Can you do that? You undead freak?” Youre one to talk “Which is why i want my real body back.” So what do you monks do. You dont seem very studied in common “We did destroy the library, so literacy rates are low.” “Im not necessarily not dying so i can read tomes. Ive read the tomes. I intend to die over and over until my soul is wholly consumed.” “This is the cycle of death. And no undeath. The cowards way out.”

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-15.ht.title: Session 15
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-15.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 14
Next Session: Session 16
Tan Sugi Monastery
Now that Zhi Hui's been here a while what greater truths has she realized that we can't see?
The fiend Kugaptee, even dead and bound, is much more powerful than I understood. Does she even feel any regrets? (Mostly a probe to see if she still has emotions or if Kugapte is suppressing them. Less for her more for us to have a signal to look out for.)
I think perhaps establishing this monastery was a mistake, I thought we might work together to strengthen the Tan Sugi Tree and protect Tan Sui-Jin’s legacy. I should have known our enemy of one thousand years might have plans equally long in the making. Is this even his mindscape or are we in something greater's mindscape? This monastery is not his mindscape, he has slumbered in his own dreams beneath this tree for much longer than we.
How does Kugapte have a perfect memory of willowshore if it is his mindscape. He does not, you do. If this is to be one of the anchors of the plain, why is it allowed to change? It shows signs of decay and change far more than the 4 months we've been in the loop, let alone you remembering the cycles. The mindscape reflects metaphor and memory, in this case it also reflects the condition of the monastery as it has become since my passing. Did we die when entering into the dreamscape what of our bodies in reality? We must hold hope you were transported here completely. Have you been able to cultivate power across cycles or does that reset whenever the reset happens? (More for figuring out if Kugapte is gaining in power)
It grows, Xin Yue chops the roots of the tree as I heal them. We remained in balance until this cycle. Will want to know about his past for sure, does she know anything about his past lives from before her death? Does she know about why he ended up this way? How he died? What he did? I know, but to tell you would be to deprive you of your spiritual journey. I could summarize a tome, but it would not be the same as reading it. Will want to know about what to expect from this fight. They’ll have to fight her lover and kugapte, anything to look out for? The fiend may offer you boons to turn to its side, pray do not listen. Only the enlightened and saint has truly resisted his corruption, a priestess almost enlightened with one spark of doubt could not. What does she want from this fight. This is her lover after all and he can respect that she presumably still cares for her. Is there a way to cleanse xin yue’s soul and help her? Is that what zhi hui would want?
A fiend in hell might one day reach enlightenment, but she who believes herself outside the cycle must first meet Lady Jansoo’s judgement.
thoughts on the Governor and what he did that caused this to happen (insert probing about how the mayor was totally stupid, he couldntve done all this himself, etc,) (trying to get more information out of her on what the mayor did to have all this be the outcome of that snowball) I passed on far before the governors arrival in this town, you will have to find him, or whatever is left, and ask. Combat Fighting her She dies and turns into a fiendish tree via kugapte Beat her Flesh and blood dont quicken kugaptes rebirth Her new fiendish form dissolves back into the tree and this area becomes revitalized Unlikely this is the last we’ll see of her For now, she has been put to rest Zhi hui is stuck back in the tree containing the fiends presence, her and and the other are making it stable Also a golden light shines about the room The holy artifacts that were presented to us by zhi hui manipulating of the dreamscape are upgraded “You’ve done well. Im glad i can rest now knowing tis monastery has been cleansed in the atrocious act here. Do not give up on your journey in the return to the real world. I believe in you all. Thank you.” Slowly fades
(governor was a spellcaster from Sze with a “penchant for married women”) Town Takes 1 day to travel back to the gate
Igawa Jubei is camped by the ritual site Did anything happen while we were out? “Hunters fought zombies, back to having a sense of direction. Apprentice did really well”
“A restless ghost was burnt alive by the governor. We have more food to go around. Kazuma Oono mentioned seeing a mask peering out at him and went home about a week ago” The rest of fall is ahead of us
Visiting Kazuma at the Seven-Colored Songbird Theater Oono is there, spending time with latest actress (young woman we rescued that has way too much freetime and adhd) knowing that she is friends of ours, he grabbed another person for the theatrical scene of the town “Youre back!” “Welcome back, oh my god I haven't been able to sleep a wink since you left.” K: why! “Ive been worried, ive had nightmares every night since you’ve been gone, ive been so worried!” Z: it might be a curse “No!” Z: daily nightmares are a curse “So true!” G: what have they been about? “My adoring fans watching me through my windows, also you guys dying.” Z: Do they wear masks? “Yes! But they don’t have faces also.” “I am planning a festival in… I think we should do the next one in 4-5 weeks. 5 weeks! Here's my vision. We fed the people, but we haven't fed the local spirits.” Z: we have bigger news “Oh. I think a tea party for the local kami might be good” Z: Yes. We’ve died a hundred times “What. roll that back???” Z: We're in a mindscape of a powerful creature that the governor started. Z: the local reality is affected by our perceptions, so dont panic the people “The more scared the people get, the more the creatures- okokok. And winter is coming. Maybe I can put some plays on, more festivals. How do we not die next time?” Z: That's what we’re working on, governor has the key Kat: Keep it to yourself pls Kav: Can you make sure no one goes up to the monastery? “What happened there? How’d it go?
Kav: Monastery safe, Pilgrim's Path not safe, keep an eye on the children. It's trashed a little, there's a lot going on there, bad time to visit. “Makes sense. Maybe later we can fix it up. Possibility of stageplays later?” Z: We need to clean out the corpses later Kav: There were no survivors Z: Describes sweetest solstice as a new festivity for winter
Zhu at Granny Hu Subtle casts suggestion on granny hu Granny hu and Zhu go off in the distance Zhu appears as her using a noppero-bo hood “Is this my karma finally come to play?” “Possibly. Would you say youre a good person? “No, but i will die with a sword in my hand Not really you have a knife in peoples back Zhu straight up kills granny hu?? She fights in the style of a palace guard, once a very talented fighter Takes her sword and smokes her fucking pipe oh my god, magically puts her body in the woods
Rest goes to Matsuki “I heard you ventured out to the old monastery, how did it go?” Katsu: its very lovely, very empty, purified, but people shouldn't go “Were there ghosts in there from the broken blades night?” Kav: There were ghosts and fiends “Oh goodness! And you vanquished them? Kav: Yeah “Our saviors! Found a solution for the fog wall?” Kav: Not yet, we have leads related to the governor, if you know anything about him? “He asked me questions about local spirits in the past 2 years. Very interested in freeing the monastery Kav: Did he ask for rituals for the tree? “Not to me, but I'm just a keeper of knowledge. Do you think he might be responsible? Kav: Its a fact not a thought “Ah makes sense with what Igawa showed me on the map Kav: We have reason to believe his disappearance is directly involved with all this “Do you think he’s somewhere outside the walls or in here?” Kav: We don't know for certain, but he has accidentally involved himself with the fiends that have taken over the monastery “GOOD GRACIOUS ME?? A FIEND?? TAKEN OVER THE MONASTERY??” General governor stressing about the tree, decides not to send sacred woodcutters “That troubles me some of the questions he was asking, about sealing and such. He did pay an old lady, she died in the night during the seasons of ghost festival. Now it's just a little child there. He was asking about bolstering seals. I thought it was about hulus, but perhaps he meant bolstering the spirits of the tree unless he was a saint, which he wasn't."
Kav: There's a lot going on with the situation and it would be imperative to have as much information as possible. Do you think that Ba-Ming Ouh might know what was discussed? “Its worth it to ask, she may have some notes from the older shrine maiden” Kav: It's a place to start “Ill keep my ears peeled and ask around unless this is too pressing of a secret” Kav: We don't want to worry the town. We think if people panic, itll worsen the situation. Who were you going to ask?
“ I was going to ask Mother Otis, Elizeth Candora, kim gu-won, anyone related. Are you thinking this is a temporary situation we’re in? If you think maintaining calmness is key, I could provide more food and luxuries than is sustainable for the long term. Kav: Not certain how long this will be. Probably at least past the winter “Ok just know this is an option. Bread and circuses, I have bread. Say the word if needed. I trust your judgement” Zhu lies about granny hu not being home Thing haunting oono leaves stone masks behind Forlorn undead, someone who died with no one to remember them Wander the land of the living trying to find any trace of when they were alive Have anger for those with loved ones, faces are transitory, representations of trying on other identities Someone has died and been forgotten completely dun dun duuuun “Your beauty, i will claw out your eyes” tries to get kavi It's easily dispatched while we’re in town, but if we leave, it could come back. Now that we know the cause, someone might be thinking about this creature. We smack it and it dies. We can just smack it when we see it around town following oono, dealt with for now.

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-16.ht.title: Session 16
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-16.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 15
Next Session: Session 17
Willowshore 3 weeks left of fall Critically succeed at regale the lost ones ritual
There is a kami out of the shrine sweeping around the Cerulean Teahouse House is impeccably clean, things are very organized, overly so downtime Zhu Breaking into estate
Granny Hu gossip Trees Guiying Meditating Helps out around town, help where hes needed, esp with farming Kavi
Talk to shrine maiden Ba-Ming Ouh Notes are encoded, written in a cipher She knows it, but her reading and writing isnt strong Kavi helps her transcribe it
Look over Yen Rui’s notes Katsu Learning spells
Helping kazuma oono Shizuka Hunting Foraging
One morning, meeting up w/ hunters at Silvermist Lodges, they have blocked off one of the buildings, ppl have gathered outside discussing things S: What's going on? “I don't think we’re going hunting today, sorry.” S: what happened? “Idk how to say it, we went to gather everyone, we found one of our companions- she was out just yesterday w us. She’s uh… ah. Taken her life.” S: fuck. okay. “We found her just about 10 mins ago. We didnt want anyone else to go in.” S: is it looking like- like she was killed or killed herself? “I mean. I know you can handle it- she hung herself.” S: fuck. shit. “I didnt even- shit, she’s still there. I just- left and shut and made sure no one else came in to check on her.” S: good. I… gimme like, 20 mins, i can see if i can get my friends to come help. “Ill keep folks away.” She goes to get Zhu for help Imposter in hidden places whispers to shizuka Kavi, guiying & katsu see a shape of crow whisper to us “A woman has killed herself, go to silvermist lodges” People from the lodge are asking questions, coming up with theories, try to come to some explanation Young half elven woman with short brown hair, looks a little like shizuka Upon cutting the rope, realize it was made of long black human hair No signs of struggle, nothing missing, door had to be unlocked She has no marks around her neck, been here 5-6 hrs Hair is obv not natural, but ghost is not still in the hair, none of the objects in the house actively haunted Shizuka notices the signs point to this woman having a heart attack Zhu agrees Kavi thinks she died of fright Best guess is something with a very specific grudge and something that does mental damage It seems based on the way her footprints are facing in the slightest detail that it came thru the door Talking corpse Z: What killed you? “I was strangled by my own hair. It was terrible, I couldn't move.” (hair color is not the same) Z: notice anything odd on the night before you were killed? “I could've sworn I heard the sound of a baby crying, but when I went to investigate, there was nothing there. There was a basket in the grass in the front circle of cabins. I didn't expect to get a roommate either. She must have come in after I fell asleep.” Z: What did she look like? “A young farmer, it looked like, with beautiful black hair. She had a small basket with her. And blue eyes.” (style of clothes were similar to how guiying’s initial life) Reincarnate critical fails, shes stuck in a fox now Little while later, guiying wakes up and smells smoke
The Willowshore Stables are on fire Figure in red dancing in the flames Zhu speedin over Sends the crows “A DEVIL BURNS THE VETERINARY STABLE” Several red cloaked figures Kavi knows that sometimes to exorcise spirits, ppl dress as demons One day, out of nowhere, no one saw him walk in, is a handsome man dressed in very fine, beautiful silk garments. Silver collar. Asks to speak to whomever is in charge. Goes to speak to kazuma oono Maybe around dinnertime, go see kazuma One thing, the guy’s collar is welded shut in the back
“Good governor, i bring a declaration of sorts. Lady Ren Mei Li is visiting tomorrow, as a princess, shes expecting a greeting of royal standards, she will declare the new rules that will be applicable to your township considering this area is now under the leadership of Lady Lang Loi.” (we dont know these nouns, kazuma looks nervous) (guiying notes that he seems truthful, prepared speech, doesnt seem very flexible in his answers)
(kavi has heard tale of- in the last year- the Jorogumo, collar their servants and weld them shut. This might mean that somehow the spiderqueen’s rule extends to our town.) K: “of course we’ll prepare our best welcome to the princess! Thank you!” Zhu: how did you get in? “I go where my mistress commands.” Zhu: may she free us so we can properly serve? “Im sorry?” Zhu: a message for your higher ups then.”
“Shed love to visit your monastic tree if the trail is safe to walk” Zhu: rn no, not in winter, but in summer it shall be K: “ive encountered the jorogumo once, they hate tengu, they hate cold iron, they hate the literate, they hate beautiful young men, and they (eat?hate?) beautiful young women.” We get new teas The guy disappeared at the border and left his collar Allows the wearer to travel freely, read and write, and trade with outsiders

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-17.ht.title: Session 17
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-17.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 16
Next Session: Session 18
Scary princess Ren Mei Li showing up in the morning Willowshore We should have a lot of things to do to prepare for her She expects the welcome that a princess would receive visiting the capital, a foreign country, etc. There should be offerings, gifts, ideally have 100 dancers ready to welcome her, a large feast with all officials present, etc We hide books We can use shapechangers to disguise as someone pretty as sacrifices Get as many as can be spared, send people across and then make them come back to update 2 occultists, 3 tricksters “Who’s faces shall we steal?” You can just make your own, do you Need to steal a face “We can only change into the faces of those that we’ve touched.”
Human Kazuma Oono + zu (2 sets of twins), random handsome guy Offer silver and oak incense burner and silver scepter set with semi-precious stones She will arrive the next morning at dawn
Arrives without her bodyguards, alone at the Spider Gate “Well hello there good officials of the town” K: hello how was your journey here “Quite bad, my feet are rather sore, I hope you prepared a palanquin to carry me.” K: unfortunately not my lady but we can retrieve a horse to carry you thru town “Nvm not necessary. Lets just go to my reception area”
Everyone bows down as she passes, but Matsuki is too old to bow all the way, so she pushes down on his back with her spider leg. Injuring sick and elderly, she's so mean Compliments rusticness of the town, smells of fish, etc, insulting us
“Oh you’re bringing me to a Cerulean Teahouse and not the Governor's Home?
Z: the Governor’s residence has completely disappeared from the town. We are simple folk and don't have magic to figure this out “Thats good, you're ahead of other towns where we had to find a new magic minister. I can appoint you someone to look into odd magical things” Z: ofc do what do it owe the honor “Lets discuss after tea” Ride into teahouse “No hot drink at the door?” K: unfortunately my lady, we weren't anticipating when you were arriving, but our tea will be fresh in a moment “Ill have to flog my servant for not giving you my exact arrival date. Maybe ill replace him with one of these pretty men The shapeshifters wheedle and jig for her and she likes it We give her energizing tea “So tell me about the history of the tea and the cup” Guiying actually Knows, she seems annoyed about it “Oh how interesting.” Guiying makes good tea, she asks why he didn't bow when serving Archaic rule, he's done it via any reasonable social norm 100 years ago, tea was served via bowing, she's looking for imperfections in the tea “Come sit, we have things to discuss. I'm sure my servant explained properly the new rules that must be undertaken? K: im afraid not my lady
“Well I'll certainly have to replace him with one of these fine young men. Now that my mother is in charge of this country, there will be changes. Firstly, tithes, you will be paying them at the end of spring each year to the Jorogumo at the seasons of ghosts ceremony. All tengu will need to be executed. All townsfolk are no longer permitted to read or write and every text you have will be turned over to your betters for safekeeping. All coin and cold iron will be melted down to avoid you influential hearts from being corrupted. Dw we’ll provide everything you might need” Z: Will that go with the tithe for seasons of ghost? “Yes of course.” Z: how will you wish tithe to be paid if not by coin? “By goods. Food, people, I guess goods again, art. People and art and food are the main ones. Of course, if you're productive enough, you won't have to give people up. But if you're short on rice, I'm sure a handsome young man will be able to replace that.” A lot of her behavior is a young woman exerting power, but in this case, these rules will apply to every single town in the country. Very clearly her mother’s demands and classic jorogumo ones at that. Yes of course my lady
“Perfect, this is a lot less weeping than I saw in the last town. I wondered, the tan sugi tree, have you all heard anything about that?
Z: we know that its nearby but its maintained by a monastery “Ill have to ask the monks about that then. Perhaps ill go visit the monastery Z: its days by walking “Oh they might have books, i’ll have to go check” S: we can always go clear out the books “Oh good yes” gives shizuka a ring “Well not that i would expect you to know anything about it anyway, so perfect that you’ll go visit for me. Is there anything I should know about the town as your new protector?”
Z; the old Governor by (insert dynasty name here) did go missing alongside his house “I wonder, i should go looking into this. Im something of an occultist. Not that you would know, but theres something called a mindscape, it might have something to do with that, or someone got rid of me We go to governors missing house and she contacts servants to bring her her tools and stuff. She’ll set up and try to start understanding whats happening here “Well there’s certainly a mindscape here. I see..almost like another town” Shes not good at it, she has powerful books and tools and shes doing things with them. We could probably figure out how to properly use them These spells could alter a mindscape, but shes either not doing it right or it isnt strong enough “Well, i think your dear governor is gone. We’ll have to think on getting a new governor. There should be an object that marks ownership of the town. We’ll have to find that. If not, we can make a new one.” Time varies for this but it involves getting ppl to believe its a representation of town ownership She gives us 4x corpse dust “Who should i bring with me? Any recommendations? Any experience serving? We bullshit and she takes all the “twins” and holds collars for them She leaves (yippee), we walk her to the border The shapechangers stay when she leaves the border, she disappears along with her servants. She leaves behind a chest and the four collars from her servants disappearing
Kazuma: so how’d it go? G: bout as good as it couldve K: given the amount of changes that are happening “Well thats good. Whatd she want? We give him a rundown “Oh that's bad, we’ll worry about it closer to the time”
Poor matsuki is being stretchered to the doctor during this “How did she get in?” A Hint: She has a very strong personality and will, and she dabbles in occultism. She dresses and speaks in a very standard way (She was wearing the persona mask, shes not actually who she said she is) “Its good shes gone in time for the festival of the kami that we scheduled for next week.” Right we forgot “Its fine. Will you help me prepare? I want to use your teahouse.” Yeah sure Skill challenge
We invite a bunch of kamis and great willow They are jazzed Townsfolk are also excited. There is an astonishing sight as many kamis mutter giggle gossip. Have a parade. Great willow is taller, there are abt 40 kamis (2x the number that ppl thought lived here) Feast Kamis dont trash the teahouse Guiying prepares the banquet well They whisper abt the entertainment, they havent seen a play in a while, they wish to be entertained with just any skill Shizuka infodumps about plants, zhu performs, guiying does flips, kavi tells stories about ghosts Theyre so jazzed that they give us a present immediately and bless the teahouse giving us a +1 bonus to tea ceremony related stuff Guiying: Boots of Free Running Katsu: Essence Charm (Crafting) Kavi: Bolka's Blessing Shizuka: Hunter's Arrowhead Zhu: Entertainers Lute with infectious enthusiasm swapped for haunting hymn Townsfolk get help from them just like the little shoemaker elves
Kami that lives in the teahouse (Kohoshi) helps us out with food, drink, and cleaning Kazuma oono is also v happy that we did this Guiying is haunted by visions Red butterflies and version of willowshore where everyone’s heads are replaced with wicker baskets On the last day of fall Frightening?
The inventor. Huo Tian-Zhe Disappears. We got exorcised….
Zhu’s sister Yong Wu-Xiu is pretty upset, so is everyone, but shes notably upset First day of winter We exist in town At a time where we’re all hanging out, midmorning, downtown willowshore
See a plume of smoke rising above cloud paper house Rushing to the scene of the fire

sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-18.ht.title: Session 18
sessions/seasons-of-ghosts/session-18.ht.description:
Prev Session: Session 17
Next Session: Session 19
Willowshore
Cloud Paper house is burning Building has spontaneously caught fire Mom of small boy who is giving foxes sushi at the shrine is screaming Just cloud paper house is burning Main lumber mill Katsu & father going into the woods to collect wood for paper Its not hot, building obv burning tho Can hear loud crying and shouting for help, several people trapped within
Sanmi Nadoya (Mom) is trying to find her son Sanmi Minhwan, but she cant see, so cant find him Lumber yard
Shizuka’s aunt Yun Mong-un is crushed under a beam, arm outstretched to the boy Small white fox, a doll, handcrafted is stuck in the rafters that have collapsed downward Minhwan dodging out of the way of the masked torchbearing creatures Guiying and zhu notice a farmer who is under rubble with just his hand peaking out 2 spiritual disruptors Spiritual disruptor killing man under rubble
Matsu healed, gotten out Boy is convinced to leave but isnt happy about it As soon as we leave, the exorcists think they've dealt with the spirits The paper mill is damaged, but not unrecoverable, with teamwork we can get it back up and running Shizuka’s aunt gives her a hug “I didn't know you were able to do things like that! The four of you are amazing!”
Z: We can claim to the Jorogumo we did this out of devotion. We’re so devoted to not reading Boy “ty ive never had a friend before. And also i didnt wanna go to hell. Thanks for doing that for me even though I'm a kid and adults don't usually do nice things like that to me. Thank you. Guys.” Boy upplays how badass we were Nadoya comes over, to shizuka & aunt “thank you for saving my son even despite what has transpired between our families.” S: Of course. He's just a kid. No kid deserves to be hurt. “He's a very sweet boy. Please, if you ever need any cucumbers from my garden, take them. Or anything from the general store, we owe you our lives.” Matsu “THANK YOU ALL i should've bought my paper on a different day! I can't believe my ill fortune!” (guy with snakes in his toilet) “i thought with all the snakes in my field, i was going to interview with the mill, but the mill collapsed! Thank you for sending your man-eyed dog to scare the snakes out of my field. If there's anything a humble farmer can do, you have to let me know!” Downtime
Zhu going to the inventor Huo Tian-Zhe his sister liked Zhu finds a drawer containing some of his sisters clothes Otherwise fairly normal, some small signs, but they're fading as the mindscape reasserts itself. Spots where the building looks aged, esp the floor, where it looks like dead grass and soil Seems like aura has caused spots of age in the floor Butterflies not hanging out here If we were to attempt to do sort of shot gun exorcism, it'd be difficult to distinguish between actual ghosts and overall evil presence that would happen to be around if such a thing was generally around
Shizuka checking on Matsuki In the clinic, is recovering He is alright
On the way back, kazuma oono gestures into house “Hows goes the investigation on that thing of the nature of the world?” Z: dead ends
“The things you recovered from the Tan Sugi Monastery werent any help?”
Yen Rui's Notes Here is what you discover from the journal, although some pages have been removed The journal is formatted in a number of sections, Prior to her arrival at the monastery, she is searching for her old mentor and friends to make amends for her cowardess
Her daily life at the monastery, in the later sections, baby Guiying is dropped off at the doorstep, she is certain that this is a challenge for Zhi Hui's ideals Trapped in the library after the massacre, handwriting growing steadily fainter, she adds a lot of her recollections on this life Ghostly recollections, attempting to record anything that could possibly be of use to someone who finds her. This is the longest section and is full of fragmented ideas and contradictions as she struggles to remember Contained within the tomes of the library should be a ritual that allows one to travel between adjacent mindscapes, she was hoping to use it to get out of the monastery but due to being a ghost wasn't able to get into the room that allowed it
If Kugaptee is killed, he will reincarnate. The monks don't know of a way to permanently take care of him. One by one the monks succumbed to fanaticism or apathy as soon as Zhi Hui died She got vivid nightmares of Zhi Hui being tortured within the tree and asking her to save them, she interpreted this as a metaphor and simply mediated harder, although it clearly wore on her
Guiying and Xin Yue have been soul shredded by a nindoru at least once, this bears extremely dire consequenses for their souls. They will both spiral and lose more and more of their souls with each life unless they can break the cycle and find peace for even one life. We get ritual Mindscape Shift Normally if we wanted to enter or exit mindscape, wed have to use mindscape spell, but in this case, that ritual is beyond the resources of the town, but we could come up with something a little closer if we were a bit more specific Learning precisely the circumstances that created the mindscape, we could create a new ritual tailored to this mindscape and go back to the real world
Kavi goes to talk to guiyings mom You So-Jin, but it will be dms Ritual mindscape shift Empty house lot
Teleported to a version of willowshore that has Governor's Home
Governor's barred the house, knock at the door, no answer We wait in front of his house Everyone comments on just seeing us recently but talk to us as if they dont know us Keep referencing locations we didnt go to Governor returns, looks a bit apprehensive, also extremely disheveled Z: you look a bit too much like me He clasps his hands together in a quick prayer for restfulness We’re not ghosts “Of course, but arent we all in this land?” We all are, we want to escape, theyve started excorcising us “We should be up when the sun comes down” Why “The unrestful spirits of my sins attempt to tear me limb from limb.” (hes telling the truth, seems oscillating between wanting to be loved and knowing he has done something terrible wrong and should be punished for it. It seems unlikely that he will be able to remember anything or speak coherently on a topic without prompting from us.) “My house. It is warded.” draws wards on ours hands so the house doesnt blow us up He invites us into his home Z: now you know what it feels like when i try to sleep He seems confident now that hes in his house He bows and serves us tea as if in apology, he has shaky hands “400 years of bad luck upon me!” Z: why did you doom us to hell?
A thing pops up from under the table, a cat named Black Bean “You remember Blackbean, you wouldnt be cruel to Blackbean, you wouldnt hurt Blackbean Z: Our master was cruel to us. No we wouldnt hurt Blackbean
“I knew what the jorogumo were going to do. They would sense the energy seeping out of the tree. Im a man of 1000 sins, but you have no idea what the jorogumo will do when they arrive. They've arrived “Dammit i thought i had til the end of the year to figure this out Its winter The sounds of our loved ones scream and scratch on the door “Pay it no mind, they do this every night. I thought i was saving us. Now we are nothing but hungry ghosts. We have nothing!! Not even the breath to cry!”

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar
